word.kjv: Then spake Elisha unto the woman, whose son he had restored to life, saying, Arise, and go thou and thine household, and sojourn wheresoever thou canst sojourn: for the LORD hath called for a famine; and it shall also come upon the land seven years.
word.thailand: ฝ่ายเอลีชาได้บอกหญิงคนที่ท่านได้ให้บุตรชายของนางกลับคืนชีวิตมาว่า "จงลุกขึ้นและออกไปทั้งครัวเรือนของเจ้า ไปอาศัยอยู่ที่ใดซึ่งเจ้าจะอาศัยอยู่ได้ เพราะพระเยโฮวาห์ทรงเรียกให้เกิดการกันดารอาหาร และจะเป็นแก่แผ่นดินนี้เจ็ดปี"
word.spanish1909: Y HABLO Eliseo á aquella mujer á cuyo hijo había hecho vivir, diciendo: Levántate, vete tú y toda tu casa á vivir donde pudieres; porque Jehová ha llamado el hambre, la cual vendrá también sobre la tierra siete años.
word.latinvulgate: Eliseus autem locutus est ad mulierem, cujus vivere fecerat filium, dicens : Surge, vade tu et domus tua, et peregrinare ubicumque repereris : vocavit enim Dominus famem, et veniet super terram septem annis.
word.italian1927: Or Eliseo avea detto alla donna di cui avea risuscitato il figliuolo: "Lèvati, vattene, tu con la tua famiglia, a soggiornare all’estero, dove potrai; perché l’Eterno ha chiamata la carestia, e difatti essa verrà nel paese per sette anni".
word.german1912: Elisa redete mit dem Weibe, dessen Sohn er hatte lebendig gemacht, und sprach: Mache dich auf und gehe hin mit deinem Hause und wohne in der Fremde, wo du kannst; denn der HERR wird eine Teuerung rufen, die wird ins Land kommen sieben Jahre lang.
word.french1910: Elisée dit à la femme dont il avait fait revivre le fils: Lève-toi, va t'en, toi et ta maison, et séjourne où tu pourras; car l'Eternel appelle la famine, et même elle vient sur le pays pour sept années.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 書念婦人復得她的產業以利沙告訴那婦人（她的兒子曾被以利沙救活），說：“你和你全家要動身，離開這裡，住在你可以寄居的地方，因為耶和華宣布了將有饑荒，這饑荒要臨到這地七年。”
word.korean: 엘리사가 이전에 아들을 다시 살려준 여인에게 이르되 너는 일어나서 네 권속과 함께 거할만한 곳으로 가서 거하라 여호와께서 기근을 명하셨으니 그대로 이 땅에 칠년 동안 임하리라
word.tagalog: Nagsalita nga si Eliseo sa babae, na ang anak ay kaniyang sinaulian ng buhay, na sinasabi, Ikaw ay bumangon at yumaon ka at ang iyong sangbahayan, at mangibang bayan ka kung saan ka makakapangibang bayan: sapagka't nagtalaga ang Panginoon ng kagutom; at magtatagal naman sa lupain na pitong taon.
word.maori: ¶ Na kua korero a Eriha ki te wahine nana nei te tamaiti i whakaorangia e ia, kua mea, Whakatika, haere koutou ko tou whare, a e noho ki tau wahi e noho ai koe: kua karangatia hoki e Ihowa he matekai; a ka pa hoki ki te whenua, e whitu tau.
word.cebuano: Ug si Eliseo misulti sa babaye; kansang anak nga lalake iyang gibanhaw, nga nagaingon: Tindog, ug lumakaw ka ug ang imong sulod-balay, ug pumuyo sa bisan diin ikaw makapuyo: kay si Jehova nagpatawag ug usa ka gutom; ug mahitabo usab kini sa yuta sa pito ka tuig.
word.hebrew: א ואלישע דבר אל האשה אשר החיה את בנה לאמר קומי ולכי אתי (את) וביתך וגורי באשר תגורי  כי קרא יהוה לרעב וגם בא אל הארץ שבע שנים
word.hebrewmodern: ואלישע דבר אל האשה אשר החיה את בנה לאמר קומי ולכי אתי וביתך וגורי באשר תגורי כי קרא יהוה לרעב וגם בא אל הארץ שבע שנים׃
word.greekot: καὶ ελισαιε ἐλάλησεν πρὸς τὴν γυναῖκα ἧς ἐζωπύρησεν τὸν υἱόν λέγων ἀνάστηθι καὶ δεῦρο σὺ καὶ ὁ οἶκός σου καὶ παροίκει οὗ ἐὰν παροικήσῃς ὅτι κέκληκεν κύριος λιμὸν ἐπὶ τὴν γῆν καί γε ἦλθεν ἐπὶ τὴν γῆν ἑπτὰ ἔτη

word.kjv: And it came to pass, as he was telling the king how he had restored a dead body to life, that, behold, the woman, whose son he had restored to life, cried to the king for her house and for her land. And Gehazi said, My lord, O king, this is the woman, and this is her son, whom Elisha restored to life.
word.thailand: และอยู่มาเมื่อเขากำลังทูลกษัตริย์ถึงเรื่องที่เอลีชาได้เรียกชีวิตของศพคนหนึ่งกลับคืนมา ดูเถิด ผู้หญิงคนที่ท่านได้ให้บุตรชายกลับคืนชีวิตมาได้อุทธรณ์ต่อกษัตริย์เพื่อขอบ้านและที่ดินของนางคืน และเกหะซีทูลว่า "ข้าแต่กษัตริย์ เจ้านายของข้าพระองค์ นี่เป็นนางคนนั้น และคนนี้แหละเป็นบุตรชายของนาง ซึ่งเอลีชาได้ให้กลับคืนชีวิตมา"
word.spanish1909: Y contando él al rey cómo había hecho vivir á un muerto, he aquí la mujer, á cuyo hijo había hecho vivir, que clamaba al rey por su casa y por sus tierras. Entonces dijo Giezi: Rey señor mío, esta es la mujer, y este es su hijo, al cual Eliseo hizo vivir.
word.latinvulgate: Cumque ille narraret regi quomodo mortuum suscitasset, apparuit mulier, cujus vivificaverat filium, clamans ad regem pro domo sua, et pro agris suis. Dixitque Giezi : Domine mi rex, hæc est mulier, et hic est filius ejus quem suscitavit Eliseus.
word.italian1927: E mentre appunto Ghehazi raccontava al re come Eliseo avea risuscitato il morto, ecco che la donna, di cui era stato risuscitato il figliuolo, venne a ricorrere al re per riavere la sua casa e le sue terre. E Ghehazi disse: "O re, mio signore, questa è quella donna, e questo è il suo figliuolo, che Eliseo ha risuscitato".
word.german1912: Und indem er dem König erzählte, wie er hätte einen Toten lebendig gemacht, sieh, da kam eben das Weib, dessen Sohn er hatte lebendig gemacht, und rief den König an um ihr Haus und ihren Acker. Da sprach Gehasi: Mein Herr König, dies ist das Weib, und dies ist der Sohn, den Elisa hat lebendig gemacht.
word.french1910: Et pendant qu'il racontait au roi comment Elisée avait rendu la vie à un mort, la femme dont Elisée avait fait revivre le fils vint implorer le roi au sujet de sa maison et de son champ. Guéhazi dit: O roi, mon seigneur, voici la femme, et voici son fils qu'Elisée a fait revivre.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他正向王講述以利沙叫死人復活的事的時候；看哪，以利沙曾救活她的兒子的那婦人來為她的房屋、田產哀求王。基哈西說：“我主我王，這就是那婦人了，她的這個兒子就是以利沙救活的了。”
word.korean: 게하시가 곧 엘리사가 죽은 자를 다시 살린 일을 왕에게 이야기 할때에 그 다시 살린 아이의 어미가 자기 집과 전토를 위하여 왕에게 호소하는지라 게하시가 가로되 내 주 왕이여 이는 그 여인 이요 저는 그 아들이니 곧 엘리사가 다시 살린 자니이다
word.tagalog: At nangyari, samantalang kaniyang sinasaysay sa hari kung paanong kaniyang isinauli ang buhay niyaon na patay, na narito, ang babae, na ang anak ay kaniyang sinaulian ng buhay, ay dumaing sa hari dahil sa kaniyang bahay at dahil sa kaniyang lupain. At sinabi ni Giezi, Panginoon ko, Oh hari, ito ang babae, at ito ang kaniyang anak na sinaulian ng buhay ni Eliseo.
word.maori: A, i a ia e korero ana ki te kingi i tana whakaoranga i te tupapaku, na, ko te wahine nana nei te tamaiti i whakaorangia e ia i te mate, e karanga ana ki te kingi mo tona whare, mo tana mara. Na ka mea a Kehati, E toku ariki, e te kingi, koia ten ei te wahine, a ko tana tama tenei i whakaorangia ra e Eriha.
word.cebuano: Ug nahitabo, sa nagasugilon siya sa hari sa iyang pagbanhaw kaniya nga namatay, nga, ania karon, ang babaye, kansang anak gibanhaw ni Eliseo, nagsangpit sa hari tungod sa iyang balay ug sa iyang yuta. Ug si Giesi miingon: Ginoo ko, Oh hari, kini mao ang babaye, ug kini ang iyang anak nga gibanhaw ni Eliseo.
word.hebrew: ה ויהי הוא מספר למלך את אשר החיה את המת והנה האשה אשר החיה את בנה צעקת אל המלך על ביתה ועל שדה ויאמר גחזי אדני המלך--זאת האשה וזה בנה אשר החיה אלישע
word.hebrewmodern: ויהי הוא מספר למלך את אשר החיה את המת והנה האשה אשר החיה את בנה צעקת אל המלך על ביתה ועל שדה ויאמר גחזי אדני המלך זאת האשה וזה בנה אשר החיה אלישע׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἐγένετο αὐτοῦ ἐξηγουμένου τῷ βασιλεῖ ὡς ἐζωπύρησεν υἱὸν τεθνηκότα καὶ ἰδοὺ ἡ γυνή ἧς ἐζωπύρησεν τὸν υἱὸν αὐτῆς ελισαιε βοῶσα πρὸς τὸν βασιλέα περὶ τοῦ οἴκου ἑαυτῆς καὶ περὶ τῶν ἀγρῶν ἑαυτῆς καὶ εἶπεν γιεζι κύριε βασιλεῦ αὕτη ἡ γυνή καὶ οὗτος ὁ υἱὸς αὐτῆς ὃν ἐζωπύρησεν ελισαιε

word.kjv: And when they went in to offer sacrifices and burnt offerings, Jehu appointed fourscore men without, and said, If any of the men whom I have brought into your hands escape, he that letteth him go, his life shall be for the life of him.
word.thailand: แล้วเขาทั้งหลายเข้าไปถวายเครื่องสัตวบูชาและเครื่องเผาบูชา เยฮูทรงวางคนแปดสิบคนไว้ภายนอก และตรัสว่า "ชายคนใดที่ปล่อยให้คนหนึ่งคนใดซึ่งเรามอบไว้ในมือเจ้าหนีรอดไปได้ เขาต้องเสียชีวิตของเขาแทน"
word.spanish1909: Y como ellos entraron para hacer sacrificios y holocaustos, Jehú puso fuera ochenta hombres, y díjoles: Cualquiera que dejare vivo alguno de aquellos hombres que yo he puesto en vuestras manos, su vida será por la del otro.
word.latinvulgate: Ingressi sunt igitur ut facerent victimas et holocausta : Jehu autem præparaverat sibi foris octoginta viros, et dixerat eis : Quicumque fugerit de hominibus his, quos ego adduxero in manus vestras, anima ejus erit pro anima illius.
word.italian1927: E quelli entrarono per offrir dei sacrifizi e degli olocausti. Or Jehu aveva appostati fuori del tempio ottanta uomini, ai quali avea detto: "Colui che lascerà fuggire qualcuno degli uomini ch’io metto in poter vostro, pagherà con la sua vita la vita di quello".
word.german1912: Und da sie hineinkamen Opfer und Brandopfer zu tun, bestellte sich Jehu außen achtzig Mann und sprach: Wenn der Männer jemand entrinnt, die ich unter eure Hände gebe, so soll für seine Seele dessen Seele sein.
word.french1910: Et ils entrèrent pour offrir des sacrifices et des holocaustes. Jéhu avait placé dehors quatre-vingts hommes, en leur disant: Celui qui laissera échapper quelqu'un des hommes que je remets entre vos mains, sa vie répondra de la sienne.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他們進去獻祭和獻燔祭。耶戶布置了八十個人在外面，說：“如果我帶來交在你們手中的人，有一個從他們中間逃脫了，你們就要以命抵命。”
word.korean: 무리가 번제와 다른 제사를 드리려고 들어간 때에 예후가 팔십인을 밖에 두며 이르되 내가 너희 손에 붙이는 사람을 한 사람이라도 도망하게 하는 자는 자기의 생명으로 그 사람의 생명을 대신하리라 하니라
word.tagalog: At sila'y nagsipasok na nangaghandog ng mga hain at ng mga handog na susunugin. Si Jehu nga ay naghalal para sa kaniya ng walongpung lalake sa labas, at nagsabi, Kung sinoman sa mga lalake na aking dalhin sa inyong mga kamay ay makatanan ang buhay ng nagpakawala ay isasagot sa buhay niyaon.
word.maori: Na haere ana ratou ki te mea i nga whakahere, i nga tahunga tinana. Na, tera kua whakaritea e Iehu ki waho etahi tangata mana, e waru tekau, a i mea ia, Ki te puta tetahi o nga tangata i kawea mai nei e ahau ki o koutou ringa, ko te tangata nana ia i tuku, ko tona matenga hei utu mo to tera matenga.
word.cebuano: Ug nanulod sila aron sa paghalad sa mga halad ug mga halad-nga sinunog. Ug si Jehu nagtudlo sa kawaloan ka mga tawo sa gawas, ug miingon: Kong kinsa sa mga tawo nga akong ihatag sa inyong mga kamot makagawas, kadtong magapagawas kaniya , ang iyang kinabuhi igapabayad sa kinabuhi niya.
word.hebrew: כד ויבאו לעשות זבחים ועלות ויהוא שם לו בחוץ שמנים איש ויאמר האיש אשר ימלט מן האנשים אשר אני מביא על ידיכם נפשו תחת נפשו
word.hebrewmodern: ויבאו לעשות זבחים ועלות ויהוא שם לו בחוץ שמנים איש ויאמר האיש אשר ימלט מן האנשים אשר אני מביא על ידיכם נפשו תחת נפשו׃
word.greekot: καὶ εἰσῆλθεν τοῦ ποιῆσαι τὰ θύματα καὶ τὰ ὁλοκαυτώματα καὶ ιου ἔταξεν ἑαυτῷ ἔξω ὀγδοήκοντα ἄνδρας καὶ εἶπεν ἀνήρ ὃς ἐὰν διασωθῇ ἀπὸ τῶν ἀνδρῶν ὧν ἐγὼ ἀνάγω ἐπὶ χεῖρας ὑμῶν ἡ ψυχὴ αὐτοῦ ἀντὶ τῆς ψυχῆς αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: And changed his prison garments: and he did eat bread continually before him all the days of his life.
word.thailand: เยโฮยาคีนจึงได้ถอดเครื่องแต่งกายของนักโทษออก และได้รับประทานที่โต๊ะเสวยของกษัตริย์เป็นปกติทุกวันตลอดชีวิต
word.spanish1909: Y mudóle los vestidos de su prisión, y comió siempre delante de él todos los días de su vida.
word.latinvulgate: Et mutavit vestes ejus, quas habuerat in carcere, et comedebat panem semper in conspectu ejus cunctis diebus vitæ suæ.
word.italian1927: Gli fece mutare le vesti di prigione; e Joiakin mangiò sempre a tavola con lui per tutto il tempo ch’ei visse:
word.german1912: und wandelte die Kleider seines Gefängnisses, und er aß allewege vor ihm sein Leben lang;
word.french1910: Il lui fit changer ses vêtements de prison, et Jojakin mangea toujours à sa table tout le temps de sa vie.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 又換下他的囚衣，賜他終生常在王面前吃飯。
word.korean: 그 죄수의 의복을 바꾸게 하고 그 일평생에 항상 왕의 앞에서 먹게 하였고
word.tagalog: At kaniyang pinalitan ang kaniyang damit na pagkabihag. At kumain si Joachin ng tinapay sa harap niya na palagi sa lahat ng kaarawan ng kaniyang buhay.
word.maori: Ko nga kakahu o tona hereherenga i whakawhitia e ia; a kai taro ana ia i tona aroaro i nga ra katoa i ora ai ia.
word.cebuano: Ug giilisan ang iyang mga bisti sa bilanggoan. Ug si Joachin nagkaon sa tinapay sa atubangan niya sa kanunay sa tanang mga adlaw sa iyang kinabuhi:
word.hebrew: כט ושנא את בגדי כלאו ואכל לחם תמיד לפניו כל ימי חייו
word.hebrewmodern: ושנא את בגדי כלאו ואכל לחם תמיד לפניו כל ימי חייו׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἠλλοίωσεν τὰ ἱμάτια τῆς φυλακῆς αὐτοῦ καὶ ἤσθιεν ἄρτον διὰ παντὸς ἐνώπιον αὐτοῦ πάσας τὰς ἡμέρας τῆς ζωῆς αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: And his allowance was a continual allowance given him of the king, a daily rate for every day, all the days of his life.
word.thailand: ส่วนงบประมาณที่ให้นั้นก็ได้รับพระราชทานจากกษัตริย์ตามความต้องการรายวันอยู่เสมอตลอดเมื่อท่านมีชีวิตอยู่
word.spanish1909: Y fuéle diariamente dada su comida de parte del rey de continuo, todos los días de su vida.
word.latinvulgate: Annonam quoque constituit ei sine intermissione, quæ et dabatur ei a rege per singulos dies omnibus diebus vitæ suæ.
word.italian1927: il re provvide continuamente al suo mantenimento quotidiano, fintanto che visse.
word.german1912: und es ward ihm ein Teil bestimmt, das man ihm allewege gab vom König, auf einen jeglichen Tag sein ganzes Leben lang. {~}
word.french1910: Le roi pourvut constamment à son entretien journalier tout le temps de sa vie.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他的生活費用，在他一生的年日中，每日不斷由王供應。
word.korean: 저의 쓸 것은 날마다 왕에게서 받는 정수가 있어서 종신토록 끊이지 아니하였더라
word.tagalog: At tungkol sa kaloob sa kaniya, may palaging kaloob na ibinibigay sa kaniya ang hari, bawa't araw isang bahagi ng pagkain, lahat ng mga araw ng kaniyang buhay.
word.maori: A ko te wahi mana, he mea pumau, he mea homai e te kingi ki a ia i tenei ra, i tenei ra, i nga ra katoa i ora ai ia.
word.cebuano: Ug alang sa iyang magasto gihatagan siya sa hari sa kanunay, sa tagsatagsa ka adlaw usa ka bahin, sa tanang mga adlaw sa iyang kinabuhi.
word.hebrew: ל וארחתו ארחת תמיד נתנה לו מאת המלך--דבר יום ביומו  כל ימי חיו  {ש}
word.hebrewmodern: וארחתו ארחת תמיד נתנה לו מאת המלך דבר יום ביומו כל ימי חיו׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἡ ἑστιατορία αὐτοῦ ἑστιατορία διὰ παντὸς ἐδόθη αὐτῷ ἐξ οἴκου τοῦ βασιλέως λόγον ἡμέρας ἐν τῇ ἡμέρᾳ αὐτοῦ πάσας τὰς ἡμέρας τῆς ζωῆς αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: And God said to Solomon, Because this was in thine heart, and thou hast not asked riches, wealth, or honour, nor the life of thine enemies, neither yet hast asked long life; but hast asked wisdom and knowledge for thyself, that thou mayest judge my people, over whom I have made thee king:
word.thailand: พระเจ้าตรัสตอบซาโลมอนว่า "เพราะว่าสิ่งนี้อยู่ในจิตใจของเจ้า และเจ้ามิได้ขอทรัพย์สมบัติ ความมั่งคั่งและเกียรติ หรือชีวิตของศัตรูเจ้า และทั้งมิได้ขอชีวิตยืนยาว แต่ได้ขอสติปัญญาและความรู้เพื่อตัวเจ้าเอง เพื่อเจ้าจะวินิจฉัยประชาชนของเรา ผู้ซึ่งเราได้ตั้งเจ้าให้เป็นกษัตริย์เหนือเขานั้น
word.spanish1909: Y dijo Dios á Salomón: Por cuanto esto fué en tu corazón, que no pediste riquezas, hacienda, ó gloria, ni el alma de los que te quieren mal, ni pediste muchos días, sino que has pedido para ti sabiduría y ciencia para juzgar mi pueblo, sobre el cual te he
word.latinvulgate: Dixit autem Deus ad Salomonem : Quia hoc magis placuit cordi tuo, et non postulasti divitias, et substantiam, et gloriam, neque animas eorum qui te oderant, sed nec dies vitæ plurimos : petisti autem sapientiam et scientiam, ut judicare possis populum meum, super quem constitui te regem :
word.italian1927: E Dio disse a Salomone: "Giacché questo è ciò che hai nel cuore, e non hai chiesto ricchezze, né beni, né gloria, né la morte de’ tuoi nemici, e nemmeno una lunga vita, ma hai chiesto per te saviezza e intelligenza per poter amministrare la giustizia per il mio popolo del quale io t’ho fatto re,
word.german1912: Da sprach Gott zu Salomo: Weil du das im Sinn hast und hast nicht um Reichtum noch um Gut noch um Ehre noch um deiner Feinde Seele noch um langes Leben gebeten, sondern hast um Weisheit und Erkenntnis gebeten, daß du mein Volk richten mögst, darüber ich dich zum König gemacht habe, {~}
word.french1910: Dieu dit à Salomon: Puisque c'est là ce qui est dans ton coeur, puisque tu ne demandes ni des richesses, ni des biens, ni de la gloire, ni la mort de tes ennemis, ni même une longue vie, et que tu demandes pour toi de la sagesse et de l'intelligence afin de juger mon peuple sur lequel je t'ai fait régner,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神對所羅門說：“你既然有這個心意：不求富足、財產、尊榮，也不求你敵人的性命，又不求長壽，只為自己求智慧和知識，好治理我的子民，就是我立你作王統治的人民，
word.korean: 하나님이 솔로몬에게 이르시되 이런 마음이 네게 있어서 부나 재물이나 존영이나 원수의 생명 멸하기를 구하지 아니하며 장수도 구하지 아니하고 오직 내가 너로 치리하게 한 내 백성을 재판하기 위하여 지혜와 지식을 구하였으니
word.tagalog: At sinabi ng Dios kay Salomon, Sapagka't ito ang sumaiyong puso, at hindi ka humingi ng kayamanan, pag-aari o karangalan o ng buhay man ng nangapopoot sa iyo, o humingi ka kaya ng mahabang buhay; kundi humingi ka ng karunungan at kaalaman sa ganang iyong sarili, upang iyong mahatulan ang aking bayan, na aking pinaggawan sa iyo na hari:
word.maori: Ano ra ko te Atua ki a Horomona, Na, i te mea ko ta tou ngakau tenei, kihai hoki koe i tono ki te taonga mou, ki te rawa, ki te kororia, ki ou hoariri ranei kia mate, kihai hoki koe i tono kia maha ou ra; heoi tau i tono ai, he ngakau mahara, he mohio, kia whakarite ai koe mo taku iwi, kua oti na koe te mea e ahau hei kingi mo ratou:
word.cebuano: Ug ang Dios miingon kang Salomon: Tungod kay kini diha sa imong kasingkasing, ug ikaw wala mangayo ug mga bahandi, pagkadato, kun kadungganan, ni sa kinabuhi nila nga nagadumot kanimo, ni mangayo ka sa hataas nga kinabuhi; kondili nangayo sa kaalam ug kahibalo alang sa imong kaugalingon, aron ikaw makahukom sa akong katawohan, nga sa ibabaw kanila gihimo ko ikaw nga hari:
word.hebrew: יא ויאמר אלהים לשלמה יען אשר היתה זאת עם לבבך ולא שאלת עשר נכסים וכבוד ואת נפש שנאיך וגם ימים רבים לא שאלת ותשאל לך חכמה ומדע אשר תשפוט את עמי אשר המלכתיך עליו
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמר אלהים לשלמה יען אשר היתה זאת עם לבבך ולא שאלת עשר נכסים וכבוד ואת נפש שנאיך וגם ימים רבים לא שאלת ותשאל לך חכמה ומדע אשר תשפוט את עמי אשר המלכתיך עליו׃
word.greekot: καὶ εἶπεν ὁ θεὸς πρὸς σαλωμων ἀνθ' ὧν ἐγένετο τοῦτο ἐν τῇ καρδίᾳ σου καὶ οὐκ ᾐτήσω πλοῦτον χρημάτων οὐδὲ δόξαν οὐδὲ τὴν ψυχὴν τῶν ὑπεναντίων καὶ ἡμέρας πολλὰς οὐκ ᾐτήσω καὶ ᾔτησας σεαυτῷ σοφίαν καὶ σύνεσιν ὅπως κρίνῃς τὸν λαόν μου ἐφ' ὃν ἐβασίλευσά σε ἐπ' αὐτόν

word.kjv: That they may offer sacrifices of sweet savours unto the God of heaven, and pray for the life of the king, and of his sons.
word.thailand: เพื่อเขาจะได้ถวายเครื่องสัตวบูชา อันเป็นกลิ่นที่พอพระทัยแด่พระเจ้าแห่งฟ้าสวรรค์ และให้อธิษฐานเพื่อชีวิตของกษัตริย์และโอรสของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Para que ofrezcan olores de holganza al Dios del cielo, y oren por la vida del rey y por sus hijos.
word.latinvulgate: Et offerant oblationes Deo cæli, orentque pro vita regis, et filiorum ejus.
word.italian1927: affinché offrano sacrifizi di odor soave all’Iddio del cielo, e preghino per la vita del re e de’ suoi figliuoli.
word.german1912: daß sie opfern zum süßen Geruch dem Gott des Himmels und bitten für das Leben des Königs und seiner Kinder.
word.french1910: afin qu'ils offrent des sacrifices de bonne odeur au Dieu des cieux et qu'ils prient pour la vie du roi et de ses fils.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 好讓他們可以獻馨香的祭給天上的　神，為王和王的子孫祈求長壽。
word.korean: 저희로 하늘의 하나님께 향기로운 제물을 드려 왕과 왕자들의 생명을 위하여 기도하게 하라
word.tagalog: Upang sila'y makapaghandog ng mga hain na pinaka masarap na amoy sa Dios ng langit, at idalangin ang buhay ng hari at ng kaniyang mga anak.
word.maori: Kia whakaherea ai e ratou etahi whakahere kakara ki te Atua o te rangi, kia inoi ai mo te kingi, mo ana tama, kia ora.
word.cebuano: Aron sila makahalad sa mga halad nga kahumot ngadto sa Dios sa langit, ug mag-ampo alang sa kinabuhi sa hari, ug sa iyang mga anak nga lalake.
word.hebrew: י די להון מהקרבין ניחוחין לאלה שמיא ומצלין לחיי מלכא ובנוהי
word.hebrewmodern: די להון מהקרבין ניחוחין לאלה שמיא ומצלין לחיי מלכא ובנוהי׃
word.greekot: ἵνα ὦσιν προσφέροντες εὐωδίας τῷ θεῷ τοῦ οὐρανοῦ καὶ προσεύχωνται εἰς ζωὴν τοῦ βασιλέως καὶ τῶν υἱῶν αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: And I said, Should such a man as I flee? and who is there, that, being as I am, would go into the temple to save his life? I will not go in.
word.thailand: แต่ข้าพเจ้าว่า "คนอย่างข้าพเจ้าจะหนีหรือ และคนอย่างข้าพเจ้าจะเข้าไปอยู่ในพระวิหารเพื่อช่วยชีวิตให้รอดได้หรือ ข้าพเจ้าจะไม่เข้าไป"
word.spanish1909: Entonces dije: ¿Un hombre como yo ha de huir? ¿y quién, que como yo fuera, entraría al templo para salvar la vida? No entraré.
word.latinvulgate: Et dixi : Num quisquam similis mei fugit ? et quis ut ego ingredietur templum, et vivet ? Non ingrediar.
word.italian1927: Ma io risposi: "Un uomo come me si dà egli alla fuga? E un uomo qual son io potrebb’egli entrare nel tempio e vivere? No, io non v’entrerò".
word.german1912: Ich aber sprach: Sollte ein solcher Mann fliehen? Sollte ein solcher Mann, wie ich bin, in den Tempel gehen, daß er lebendig bleibe? Ich will nicht hineingehen. {~}
word.french1910: Je répondis: Un homme comme moi prendre la fuite! Et quel homme tel que moi pourrait entrer dans le temple et vivre? Je n'entrerai point.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我回答：“像我這樣的人，怎可以逃跑呢？哪有像我這樣的人，進入聖殿裡去保全自己的性命呢？我決不進去！”
word.korean: 내가 이르기를 `나같은 자가 어찌 도망하며 나같은 몸이면 누가 외소에 들어가서 생명을 보존하겠느냐 ? 나는 들어가지 않겠노라' 하고
word.tagalog: At aking sinabi, Tatakas ba ang isang lalaking gaya ko? at sino kaya; na sa paraang gaya ko, ay paroroon sa templo upang iligtas ang kaniyang buhay? hindi ako papasok.
word.maori: Na ka mea ahau, Me oma ranei te tangata penei i ahau nei? ko wai te tangata o toku rite e haere ki roto ki te temepara kia ora ai? E kore ahau e haere ki roto.
word.cebuano: Ug ako miingon: Mokalagiw ba kaha ang usa ka tawo nga maingon kanako? Ug kinsa didto, nga maingon kanako, moadto sa templo aron sa pagluwas sa iyang kinabuhi? Ako dili mosulod.
word.hebrew: יא ואמרה האיש כמוני יברח ומי כמוני אשר יבא אל ההיכל וחי לא אבוא
word.hebrewmodern: ואמרה האיש כמוני יברח ומי כמוני אשר יבוא אל ההיכל וחי לא אבוא׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Then Esther the queen answered and said, If I have found favour in thy sight, O king, and if it please the king, let my life be given me at my petition, and my people at my request:
word.thailand: พระราชินีเอสเธอร์ทูลตอบว่า "ข้าแต่กษัตริย์ ถ้าหม่อมฉันเป็นที่โปรดปรานในสายพระเนตรของพระองค์ และถ้าเป็นที่พอพระทัยกษัตริย์ ขอพระราชทานชีวิตของหม่อมฉันให้แก่หม่อมฉันตามคำร้องขอของหม่อมฉัน และชีวิตของชนชาติของหม่อมฉันตามคำทูลขอของหม่อมฉัน
word.spanish1909: Entonces la reina Esther respondió y dijo: Oh rey, si he hallado gracia en tus ojos, y si al rey place, séame dada mi vida por mi petición, y mi pueblo por mi demanda.
word.latinvulgate: Ad quem illa respondit : Si inveni gratiam in oculis tuis o rex, et si tibi placet, dona mihi animam meam pro qua rogo, et populum meum pro quo obsecro.
word.italian1927: Allora la regina Ester rispose dicendo: "Se ho trovato grazia agli occhi tuoi, o re, e se così piace al re, la mia richiesta è che mi sia donata la vita; e il mio desiderio, che mi sia donato il mio popolo.
word.german1912: Esther, die Königin, antwortete und sprach: habe ich Gnade vor dir gefunden, o König, und gefällt es dem König, so gib mir mein Leben um meiner Bitte willen und mein Volk um meines Begehrens willen.
word.french1910: La reine Esther répondit: Si j'ai trouvé grâce à tes yeux, ô roi, et si le roi le trouve bon, accorde-moi la vie, voilà ma demande, et sauve mon peuple, voilà mon désir!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 王后以斯帖回答，說：“我若是在你眼前蒙恩，王若是喜歡，我所要的，是要王把我的性命賜給我；我所求的，是求王把我的族人賜給我。
word.korean: 왕후 에스더가 대답하여 가로되 `왕이여 ! 내가 만일 왕의 목전에서 은혜를 입었으며 왕이 선히 여기시거든 내 소청대로 내 생명을 내게 주시고 내 요구대로 내 민족을 내게 주소서
word.tagalog: Nang magkagayo'y sumagot, at nagsabi si Esther na reina, Kung ako'y nakasumpong ng biyaya sa iyong paningin, Oh hari, at kung kalulugdan ng hari, ipagkaloob sa akin ang aking buhay sa aking hingi at ang aking bayan sa aking hiling:
word.maori: Katahi ka whakautu a Kuini Ehetere, ka mea, Ki te mea kua manakohia ahau e koe, e te kingi, a ki te pai te kingi; ko taku e mea ai maku, ko ahau kia whakaorangia, ko taku e tono nei maku, ko toku iwi.
word.cebuano: Ug si Ester nga reina mitubag ug namulong: Kong ako nakapahimuot kanimo sa imong pagtan-aw, Oh hari, ug kong kini nakapahimuot sa hari, ihatag kanako ang akong kinabuhi tungod sa akong paghangyo, ug ang akong katawohan tungod sa akong gipangayo:
word.hebrew: ג ותען אסתר המלכה ותאמר--אם מצאתי חן בעיניך המלך ואם על המלך טוב  תנתן לי נפשי בשאלתי ועמי בבקשתי
word.hebrewmodern: ותען אסתר המלכה ותאמר אם מצאתי חן בעיניך המלך ואם על המלך טוב תנתן לי נפשי בשאלתי ועמי בבקשתי׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἀποκριθεῖσα εἶπεν εἰ εὗρον χάριν ἐνώπιον τοῦ βασιλέως δοθήτω ἡ ψυχή μου τῷ αἰτήματί μου καὶ ὁ λαός μου τῷ ἀξιώματί μου

word.kjv: And the king arising from the banquet of wine in his wrath went into the palace garden: and Haman stood up to make request for his life to Esther the queen; for he saw that there was evil determined against him by the king.
word.thailand: กษัตริย์ทรงลุกขึ้นจากการเลี้ยงเหล้าองุ่นด้วยทรงพระพิโรธ และเสด็จเข้าไปในราชอุทยาน แต่ฮามานยังอยู่เพื่อทูลขอชีวิตจากพระราชินีเอสเธอร์ เพราะท่านเห็นว่ากษัตริย์ทรงมุ่งร้ายต่อท่านแล้ว
word.spanish1909: Levantóse luego el rey del banquete del vino en su furor, y se fué al huerto del palacio: y quedóse Amán para procurar de la reina Esther por su vida; porque vió que estaba resuelto para él el mal de parte del rey.
word.latinvulgate: Rex autem iratus surrexit, et de loco convivii intravit in hortum arboribus consitum. Aman quoque surrexit ut rogaret Esther reginam pro anima sua : intellexit enim a rege sibi paratum malum.
word.italian1927: E il re tutto adirato si alzò, e dal luogo del convito andò nel giardino del palazzo; ma Haman rimase per chieder la grazia della vita alla regina Ester, perché vedeva bene che nell’animo del re la sua rovina era decisa.
word.german1912: Und der König stand auf vom Mahl und vom Wein in seinem Grimm und ging in den Garten am Hause. Und Haman stand auf und bat die Königin Esther um sein Leben; denn er sah, daß ihm ein Unglück vom König schon bereitet war.
word.french1910: Et le roi, dans sa colère, se leva et quitta le festin, pour aller dans le jardin du palais. Haman resta pour demander grâce de la vie à la reine Esther, car il voyait bien que sa perte était arrêtée dans l'esprit du roi.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 哈曼被掛在自己所立的木架於是王帶著盛怒，從酒席間起來，到御園裡去；哈曼卻留下來求王后以斯帖救他一命，因為哈曼看出王已經決意要加罪與他。
word.korean: 왕이 노하여 일어나서 잔치 자리를 떠나 왕궁 후원으로 들어가니라 하만이 일어서서 왕후 에스더에게 생명을 구하니 이는 왕이 자기에게 화를 내리기로 결심한 줄 앎이더라
word.tagalog: At ang hari ay tumindig sa pigingan ng alak sa kaniyang pagkapoot, at pumasok sa halamanan ng bahay-hari: at si Aman ay tumayo upang ipamanhik ang kaniyang buhay kay Esther na reina; sapagka't nakita niya na may kasamaang ipinasiya laban sa kaniya ang hari.
word.maori: ¶ Na whakatika ana te kingi, i te inumanga waina, he riri hoki nona, a haere ana ki te kari o te whare. Ko Hamana hoki, tu tonu ki te inoi ki a Kuini Ehetere mona kia whakaorangia: i kite hoki ia kua takoto te he mona i te kingi.
word.cebuano: Ug ang hari mitindog sa iyang kasuko gikan sa combira sa vino ug miadto sa tanaman sa palacio: ug si Aman mitindog aron sa paghangyo tungod sa iyang kinabuhi kang Ester nga reina; kay nakita niya nga may kadautan nga gihunahuna kaniya ang hari.
word.hebrew: ז והמלך קם בחמתו ממשתה היין אל גנת הביתן והמן עמד לבקש על נפשו מאסתר המלכה--כי ראה כי כלתה אליו הרעה מאת המלך
word.hebrewmodern: והמלך קם בחמתו ממשתה היין אל גנת הביתן והמן עמד לבקש על נפשו מאסתר המלכה כי ראה כי כלתה אליו הרעה מאת המלך׃
word.greekot: ὁ δὲ βασιλεὺς ἐξανέστη ἐκ τοῦ συμποσίου εἰς τὸν κῆπον ὁ δὲ αμαν παρῃτεῖτο τὴν βασίλισσαν ἑώρα γὰρ ἑαυτὸν ἐν κακοῖς ὄντα

word.kjv: Wherein the king granted the Jews which were in every city to gather themselves together, and to stand for their life, to destroy, to slay, and to cause to perish, all the power of the people and province that would assault them, both little ones and women, and to take the spoil of them for a prey,
word.thailand: ตามจดหมายเหล่านี้กษัตริย์ทรงอนุญาตให้พวกยิวผู้อยู่ในทุกเมืองชุมนุมกันและป้องกันชีวิตของตน ให้ทำลาย ให้สังหารและให้ล้างผลาญกำลังพลใดๆของประชาชนหรือมณฑลใดๆซึ่งจะมาทำร้าย ทั้งเด็กและผู้หญิง และปล้นเอาข้าวของของเขา
word.spanish1909: Con intimación de que el rey concedía á los Judíos que estaban en todas la ciudades, que se juntasen y estuviesen á la defensa de su vida, prontos á destruir, y matar, y acabar con todo ejército de pueblo o provincia que viniese contra ellos, aun niños y
word.latinvulgate: Quibus imperavit rex, ut convenirent Judæos per singulas civitates, et in unum præciperent congregari ut starent pro animabus suis, et omnes inimicos suos cum conjugibus ac liberis et universis domibus, interficerent atque delerent, et spolia eorum diriperent.
word.italian1927: In esse il re permetteva ai Giudei, in qualunque città si trovassero, di radunarsi e di difendere la loro vita, di distruggere, uccidere, sterminare, non esclusi i bambini e le donne, tutta la gente armata, di qualunque popolo e di qualunque provincia si fosse, che li assalisse, e di abbandonare al saccheggio i suoi beni;
word.german1912: darin der König den Juden Macht gab, in welchen Städten sie auch waren, sich zu versammeln und zu stehen für ihr Leben und zu vertilgen, zu erwürgen und umzubringen alle Macht des Volkes und Landes, die sie ängsteten, samt den Kindern und Weibern, und ihr Gut zu rauben
word.french1910: Par ces lettres, le roi donnait aux Juifs, en quelque ville qu'ils fussent, la permission de se rassembler et de défendre leur vie, de détruire, de tuer et de faire périr, avec leurs petits enfants et leurs femmes, tous ceux de chaque peuple et de chaque province qui prendraient les armes pour les attaquer, et de livrer leurs biens au pillage,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 文書上寫著：王准許在各城的猶大人，可以聚集起來，保護自己的性命；也可以毀滅、殺盡和滅絕那些敵對猶大人的各族和各省的勢力，包括婦孺，並且可以掠奪他們的財產；
word.korean: 조서에는 왕이 여러 고을에 있는 유다인에게 허락하여 저희로 함께 모여 스스로 생명을 보호하여 각 도의 백성 중 세력을 가지고 저희를 치려하는 자와 그 처자를 죽이고 도륙하고 진멸하고 그 재산을 탈취하게 하되
word.tagalog: Na pinagkakalooban ng hari ang mga Judio na nangasa bawa't bayan, na magpipisan, at ipagsanggalang ang kanilang buhay, upang magpahamak, pumatay, at magpalipol, sa buong kapangyarihan ng bayan at lalawigan na loloob sa kanila, sa kanilang mga bata at mga babae, at kumuha ng samsam sa kanila na pinakahuli,

word.french1910: Pourquoi saisirais-je ma chair entre les dents? J'exposerai plutôt ma vie.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我已把我的肉掛在自己的牙上，把我的命放在自己的手中。
word.korean: 내가 어찌하여 내 살을 내 이로 물고 내 생명을 내 손에 두겠느냐 ?
word.tagalog: Bakit kakagatin ng aking mga ngipin ang aking laman, at aking ilalagay ang aking buhay sa aking kamay?
word.maori: He aha oku kikokiko i ngaua ai e oku niho? He aha toku wairua i waiho ai e ahau i roto i toku ringa?
word.cebuano: Ngano man nga kuhaon ko ang akong unod sa mga ngipon nako, Ug ibutang ko ang akong kinabuhi sa kamot nako?
word.hebrew: יד  על-מה אשא בשרי בשני    ונפשי אשים בכפי
word.hebrewmodern: על מה אשא בשרי בשני ונפשי אשים בכפי׃
word.greekot: ἀναλαβὼν τὰς σάρκας μου τοῖς ὀδοῦσιν ψυχὴν δέ μου θήσω ἐν χειρί

word.kjv: He draweth also the mighty with his power: he riseth up, and no man is sure of life.
word.thailand: เขาได้ทำลายคนที่มีกำลังด้วยอำนาจของตน เขาลุกขึ้น แล้วไม่มีใครมั่นใจเรื่องชีวิตของตน
word.spanish1909: Mas á los fuertes adelantó con su poder: Levantóse, y no se da por segura la vida.
word.latinvulgate: Detraxit fortes in fortitudine sua, et cum steterit, non credet vitæ suæ.
word.italian1927: Invece, Iddio con la sua forza prolunga i giorni dei prepotenti, i quali risorgono, quand’ormai disperavan della vita.
word.german1912: Aber Gott erhält die Mächtigen durch seine Kraft, daß sie wieder aufstehen, wenn sie am Leben verzweifelten.
word.french1910: Non! Dieu par sa force prolonge les jours des violents, Et les voilà debout quand ils désespéraient de la vie;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神卻用自己的能力延長強暴的人的性命，生命難保的仍然興起。
word.korean: 그러나 하나님이 그 권능으로 강한 자들을 보존시키시니 살기를 바라지 못할 자도 일어나는구나
word.tagalog: Inaagawan naman ng Dios ang may kaya sa pamamagitan ng kaniyang kapangyarihan: siya'y bumabangon na walang katiwasayan sa buhay.
word.maori: E kumea atu ana hoki e ia nga marohirohi ki tona kaha: ka whakatika ake ia, kahore he tangata e u ki te ora.
word.cebuano: Apan ang Dios sa iyang kagahum nagabantay sa mga gamhanan tungod sa iyang gahum; Iyang gipatindog kadtong walay katinoan sa iyang kinabuhi.
word.hebrew: כב  ומשך אבירים בכחו    יקום ולא-יאמין בחיין
word.hebrewmodern: ומשך אבירים בכחו יקום ולא יאמין בחיין׃
word.greekot: θυμῷ δὲ κατέστρεψεν ἀδυνάτους ἀναστὰς τοιγαροῦν οὐ μὴ πιστεύσῃ κατὰ τῆς ἑαυτοῦ ζωῆς

word.kjv: If I have eaten the fruits thereof without money, or have caused the owners thereof to lose their life:
word.thailand: ถ้าข้ากินผลิตผลของมันด้วยมิได้เสียเงิน และกระทำให้เจ้าของที่ดินเดิมนั้นเสียชีวิต
word.spanish1909: Si comí su sustancia sin dinero, O afligí el alma de sus dueños;
word.latinvulgate: si fructus ejus comedi absque pecunia, et animam agricolarum ejus afflixi :
word.italian1927: se ne ho mangiato il frutto senza pagarla, se ho fatto sospirare chi la coltivava,
word.german1912: hab ich seine Früchte unbezahlt gegessen und das Leben der Ackerleute sauer gemacht:
word.french1910: Si j'en ai mangé le produit sans l'avoir payée, Et que j'aie attristé l'âme de ses anciens maîtres;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我若吃地裡的出產而不給價銀，或使地主氣絕身亡，
word.korean: 언제 내가 값을 내지 않고 그 소산물을 먹고 그 소유주로 생명을 잃게 하였던가
word.tagalog: Kung kumain ako ng bunga niyaon na walang bayad, o ipinahamak ko ang buhay ng mga may-ari niyaon:
word.maori: Ki te mea i kainga e ahau ona hua, he mea kihai i utua, a naku ranei ona ariki i mate ai,
word.cebuano: Kong gikaon ko ang mga bunga niana sa walay bayad, Kun gipildi ko ang kinabuhi sa mga tag-iya niana:
word.hebrew: לט  אם-כחה אכלתי בלי-כסף    ונפש בעליה הפחתי
word.hebrewmodern: אם כחה אכלתי בלי כסף ונפש בעליה הפחתי׃
word.greekot: εἰ δὲ καὶ τὴν ἰσχὺν αὐτῆς ἔφαγον μόνος ἄνευ τιμῆς εἰ δὲ καὶ ψυχὴν κυρίου τῆς γῆς ἐκβαλὼν ἐλύπησα

word.kjv: The Spirit of God hath made me, and the breath of the Almighty hath given me life.
word.thailand: พระวิญญาณของพระเจ้าได้ทรงสร้างข้าพเจ้า และลมปราณขององค์ผู้ทรงมหิทธิฤทธิ์ได้ให้ชีวิตแก่ข้าพเจ้า
word.spanish1909: El espíritu de Dios me hizo, Y la inspiración del Omnipotente me dió vida.
word.latinvulgate: Spiritus Dei fecit me, et spiraculum Omnipotentis vivificavit me.
word.italian1927: Lo spirito di Dio mi ha creato, e il soffio dell’Onnipotente mi dà la vita.
word.german1912: Der Geist Gottes hat mich gemacht, und der Odem des Allmächtigen hat mir das Leben gegeben.
word.french1910: L'esprit de Dieu m'a créé, Et le souffle du Tout-Puissant m'anime.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神的靈創造了我，全能者的氣使我存活。
word.korean: 하나님의 신이 나를 지으셨고 전능자의 기운이 나를 살리시느니라
word.tagalog: Nilalang ako ng Espiritu ng Dios, at ang hinga ng Makapangyarihan sa lahat ay nagbibigay sa akin ng buhay.
word.maori: He mea hanga ahau na te Wairua o te Atua, a na te manawa o te Kaha Rawa ahau i whai ora ai.
word.cebuano: Ang Espiritu sa Dios nagbuhat kanako, Ug ang gininhawa sa Makagagahum nagahatag kanako ug kinabuhi.
word.hebrew: ד  רוח-אל עשתני    ונשמת שדי תחיני
word.hebrewmodern: רוח אל עשתני ונשמת שדי תחיני׃
word.greekot: πνεῦμα θεῖον τὸ ποιῆσάν με πνοὴ δὲ παντοκράτορος ἡ διδάσκουσά με

word.kjv: He keepeth back his soul from the pit, and his life from perishing by the sword.
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงยึดเหนี่ยววิญญาณของเขาไว้จากปากแดนคนตาย และยึดชีวิตของเขาไว้จากการที่จะพินาศด้วยดาบ
word.spanish1909: Detendrá su alma de corrupción, Y su vida de que pase á cuchillo.
word.latinvulgate: eruens animam ejus a corruptione, et vitam illius, ut non transeat in gladium.
word.italian1927: per salvargli l’anima dalla fossa, la vita dal dardo mortale.
word.german1912: und verschone seine Seele vor dem Verderben und sein Leben, daß es nicht ins Schwert falle.
word.french1910: Afin de garantir son âme de la fosse Et sa vie des coups du glaive.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 攔阻人的性命不下在坑裡，又阻止他的生命不死在刀下。
word.korean: 그는 사람의 혼으로 구덩이에 빠지지 않게 하시며 그 생명으로 칼에 멸망치 않게 하시느니라
word.tagalog: Kaniyang pinipigil ang kaniyang kaluluwa sa pagbulusok sa hukay, at ang kaniyang buhay sa pagkamatay sa pamamagitan ng tabak.
word.maori: E puritia ana e ia tona wairua kei tae ki te rua, tona ora kei riro i te hoari.
word.cebuano: Gipugngan niya ang iyang kalag gikan sa gahong, Ug ang iyang kinabuhi gikan sa kamatayon pinaagi sa pinuti.
word.hebrew: יח  יחשך נפשו מני-שחת    וחיתו מעבר בשלח
word.hebrewmodern: יחשך נפשו מני שחת וחיתו מעבר בשלח׃
word.greekot: ἐφείσατο δὲ τῆς ψυχῆς αὐτοῦ ἀπὸ θανάτου καὶ μὴ πεσεῖν αὐτὸν ἐν πολέμῳ

word.kjv: So that his life abhorreth bread, and his soul dainty meat.
word.thailand: ชีวิตของเขาจึงได้เบื่ออาหาร และจิตใจจึงได้เบื่ออาหารโอชะ
word.spanish1909: Que le hace que su vida aborrezca el pan, Y su alma la comida suave.
word.latinvulgate: Abominabilis ei fit in vita sua panis, et animæ illius cibus ante desiderabilis.
word.italian1927: quand’egli ha in avversione il pane, e l’anima sua schifa i cibi più squisiti;
word.german1912: und richtet ihm sein Leben so zu, daß ihm vor seiner Speise ekelt, und seine Seele, daß sie nicht Lust zu essen hat.
word.french1910: Alors il prend en dégoût le pain, Même les aliments les plus exquis;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 以致他的生命厭惡食物，他的胃口也厭惡美食，
word.korean: 그의 마음은 식물을 싫어하고 그의 혼은 별미를 싫어하며
word.tagalog: Na anopa't kinayayamutan ng kaniyang buhay ang tinapay, at ng kaniyang kaluluwa ang pagkaing pinakamasarap,
word.maori: A whakarihariha ana tona ora ki te taro, tona wairua ki te kai whakaminamina.
word.cebuano: Busa ang iyang kinabuhi lulud-on sa tinapay, Ug ang iyang kalag sa kalan-on nga labing lamian.
word.hebrew: כ  וזהמתו חיתו לחם    ונפשו מאכל תאוה
word.hebrewmodern: וזהמתו חיתו לחם ונפשו מאכל תאוה׃
word.greekot: πᾶν δὲ βρωτὸν σίτου οὐ μὴ δύνηται προσδέξασθαι καὶ ἡ ψυχὴ αὐτοῦ βρῶσιν ἐπιθυμήσει

word.kjv: Yea, his soul draweth near unto the grave, and his life to the destroyers.
word.thailand: เออ วิญญาณของเขาเข้าไปใกล้ปากแดนคนตาย และชีวิตของเขาใกล้ผู้ที่นำความตายมา
word.spanish1909: Y su alma se acerca al sepulcro, Y su vida á los que causan la muerte.
word.latinvulgate: Appropinquavit corruptioni anima ejus, et vita illius mortiferis.
word.italian1927: l’anima sua si avvicina alla fossa, e la sua vita a quelli che dànno la morte.
word.german1912: daß seine Seele naht zum Verderben und sein Leben zu den Toten.
word.french1910: Son âme s'approche de la fosse, Et sa vie des messagers de la mort.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他的性命接近深坑，他的生命靠近滅命的天使。
word.korean: 그의 혼이 구덩이에, 그의 생명이 멸하는 자에게 가까와지느니라
word.tagalog: Oo, ang kaniyang kaluluwa ay nalalapit sa hukay, at ang kaniyang buhay sa mga mangwawasak.
word.maori: Heoi e whakatata ana tona wairua ki te rua, tona ora ki nga kaiwhakamate.
word.cebuano: Oo, ang iyang kalag nagakahaduol ngadto sa gahong, Ug ang iyang kinabuhi ngadto sa mga manlalaglag.
word.hebrew: כב  ותקרב לשחת נפשו    וחיתו לממתים
word.hebrewmodern: ותקרב לשחת נפשו וחיתו לממתים׃
word.greekot: ἤγγισεν δὲ εἰς θάνατον ἡ ψυχὴ αὐτοῦ ἡ δὲ ζωὴ αὐτοῦ ἐν ᾅδῃ

word.kjv: He will deliver his soul from going into the pit, and his life shall see the light.
word.thailand: พระองค์จะทรงไถ่จิตวิญญาณของเขาให้พ้นจากการลงไปสู่ปากแดนคนตาย และชีวิตของเขาจะเห็นความสว่าง
word.spanish1909: Dios redimirá su alma, que no pase al sepulcro, Y su vida se verá en luz.
word.latinvulgate: Liberavit animam suam, ne pergeret in interitum, sed vivens lucem videret.
word.italian1927: Iddio ha riscattato l’anima mia, onde non scendesse nella fossa e la mia vita si schiude alla luce!"
word.german1912: Er hat meine Seele erlöst, daß sie nicht führe ins Verderben, sondern mein Leben das Licht sähe."
word.french1910: Dieu a délivré mon âme pour qu'elle n'entrât pas dans la fosse, Et ma vie s'épanouit à la lumière!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他救贖我的性命免入深坑，我的生命必得見光明。’
word.korean: 하나님이 내 영혼을 건지사 구덩이에 내려가지 않게 하셨으니 내 생명이 빛을 보겠구나 하리라
word.tagalog: Kaniyang tinubos ang aking kaluluwa sa pagyao sa hukay, at ang aking buhay ay makakakita ng liwanag.
word.maori: Kua whakaorangia e ia toku wairua kei riro ki te rua, a e kite toku wairua i te marama.
word.cebuano: Iyang giluwas ang akong kalag gikan sa kahulogon sa gahong, Ug ang akong kinabuhi makakita sa kahayag.
word.hebrew: כח  פדה נפשי (נפשו) מעבר בשחת    וחיתי (וחיתו) באור תראה
word.hebrewmodern: פדה נפשי מעבר בשחת וחיתי באור תראה׃
word.greekot: σῶσον ψυχήν μου τοῦ μὴ ἐλθεῖν εἰς διαφθοράν καὶ ἡ ζωή μου φῶς ὄψεται

word.kjv: He preserveth not the life of the wicked: but giveth right to the poor.
word.thailand: พระองค์มิได้สงวนชีวิตคนชั่ว แต่ทรงประทานความยุติธรรมแก่คนยากจน
word.spanish1909: No otorgará vida al impío, Y á los afligidos dará su derecho.
word.latinvulgate: sed non salvat impios, et judicium pauperibus tribuit.
word.italian1927: Ei non lascia viver l’empio, e fa ragione ai miseri.
word.german1912: Den Gottlosen erhält er nicht, sondern hilft dem Elenden zum Recht.
word.french1910: Il ne laisse pas vivre le méchant, Et il fait droit aux malheureux.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他不容惡人生存，卻為困苦人主持公道。
word.korean: 눈을 명하여 땅에 내리라 하시며 적은 비와 큰 비도 그 같이 내리게 하시느니라
word.tagalog: Hindi niya pinanatili ang buhay ng masama: nguni't nagbibigay ng matuwid sa napipighati.
word.maori: E kore te tangata kino e whakaorangia e ia; mana te hunga mate e whiwhi ai ki nga mea e tika ana ma ratou.
word.cebuano: Siya dili magbantay sa kinabuhi sa tawong dautan, Apan magahatag sa mga sinakit sa ilang katungod.
word.hebrew: ו  לא-יחיה רשע    ומשפט עניים יתן
word.hebrewmodern: לא יחיה רשע ומשפט עניים יתן׃
word.greekot: ἀσεβῆ οὐ μὴ ζωοποιήσει καὶ κρίμα πτωχῶν δώσει

word.kjv: They die in youth, and their life is among the unclean.
word.thailand: เขาตายเมื่อยังหนุ่มอยู่ และชีวิตของเขาอยู่ท่ามกลางพวกกะเทย
word.spanish1909: Fallecerá el alma de ellos en su mocedad, Y su vida entre los sodomitas.
word.latinvulgate: Morietur in tempestate anima eorum, et vita eorum inter effeminatos.
word.italian1927: così muoiono nel fior degli anni, e la lor vita finisce come quella dei dissoluti;
word.german1912: So wird ihre Seele in der Jugend sterben und ihr Leben unter den Hurern.
word.french1910: Ils perdent la vie dans leur jeunesse, Ils meurent comme les débauchés.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他必早年喪命，喪命如廟妓一樣。
word.korean: 욥이여 이것을 듣고 가만히 서서 하나님의 기묘하신 일을 궁구하라
word.tagalog: Sila'y nangamamatay sa kabataan, at ang kanilang buhay ay napapahamak sa gitna ng marumi.
word.maori: Ka mate ratou i te taitamarikitanga, a ka ngaro to ratou ora i roto i te hunga poke.
word.cebuano: Sila sa kabatan-on mangamatay, Ug ang ilang kinabuhi mangawagtang sa taliwala sa mga mahugaw.
word.hebrew: יד  תמת בנער נפשם    וחיתם בקדשים
word.hebrewmodern: תמת בנער נפשם וחיתם בקדשים׃
word.greekot: ἀποθάνοι τοίνυν ἐν νεότητι ἡ ψυχὴ αὐτῶν ἡ δὲ ζωὴ αὐτῶν τιτρωσκομένη ὑπὸ ἀγγέλων

word.kjv: Let the enemy persecute my soul, and take it; yea, let him tread down my life upon the earth, and lay mine honour in the dust. Selah.
word.thailand: ก็ขอให้ศัตรูข่มเหงจิตวิญญาณข้าพระองค์ทัน และให้เขาเหยียบย่ำชีวิตข้าพระองค์ลงถึงดิน และวางเกียรติยศของข้าพระองค์ไว้ในผงคลี เซลาห์
word.spanish1909: Persiga el enemigo mi alma, y alcánce la; Y pise en tierra mi vida, Y mi honra ponga en el polvo. (Selah.)
word.latinvulgate: si reddidi retribuentibus mihi mala, decidam merito ab inimicis meis inanis.
word.italian1927: perseguiti pure il nemico l’anima mia e la raggiunga, e calpesti al suolo la mia vita, e stenda la mia gloria nella polvere. Sela.
word.german1912: so verfolge mein Feind meine Seele und ergreife sie und trete mein Leben zu Boden und lege meine Ehre in den Staub. (Sela.)
word.french1910: Que l'ennemi me poursuive et m'atteigne, Qu'il foule à terre ma vie, Et qu'il couche ma gloire dans la poussière! -Pause.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 就任憑仇敵追趕我，直到追上，把我的性命踐踏在地上，使我的光榮歸於塵土。（細拉）
word.korean: 원수로 나의 영혼을 쫓아 잡아 내 생명을 땅에 짓밟고 내 영광을 진토에 떨어뜨리게 하소서 (셀라)
word.tagalog: Habulin ng kaaway ang aking kaluluwa, at abutan; Oo, yapakan niya ang aking kaluluwa sa lupa, at ilagay ang aking kaluwalhatian sa alabok. (Selah)
word.maori: Kia arumia toku wairua e te hoariri, a kia mau; kia takahia hoki toku ora e ia ki te whenua, kia whakatokotoria ano toku kororia ki te puehu. (Hera.
word.cebuano: Ipalutos sa kaaway ang akong kalag, ug hiagpasan kini; Oo, patumbi kaniya ngadto sa yuta ang akong kinabuhi, Ug ang akong himaya ibutang diha sa abug. (Selah
word.hebrew: ה  אם-גמלתי שולמי רע    ואחלצה צוררי ריקם
word.hebrewmodern: ירדף אויב נפשי וישג וירמס לארץ חיי וכבודי לעפר ישכן סלה׃
word.greekot: εἰ ἀνταπέδωκα τοῖς ἀνταποδιδοῦσίν μοι κακά ἀποπέσοιν ἄρα ἀπὸ τῶν ἐχθρῶν μου κενός

word.kjv: Thou wilt shew me the path of life: in thy presence is fulness of joy; at thy right hand there are pleasures for evermore.
word.thailand: พระองค์จะทรงสำแดงวิถีแห่งชีวิตแก่ข้าพระองค์ ต่อพระพักตร์พระองค์มีความชื่นบานอย่างเปี่ยมล้น ในพระหัตถ์ขวาของพระองค์มีความเพลิดเพลินอยู่เป็นนิตย์
word.spanish1909: Me mostrarás la senda de la vida: Hartura de alegrías hay con tu rostro; Deleites en tu diestra para siempre.
word.latinvulgate: Projicientes me nunc circumdederunt me ; oculos suos statuerunt declinare in terram.
word.italian1927: Tu mi mostrerai il sentiero della vita; vi son gioie a sazietà nella tua presenza; vi son diletti alla tua destra in eterno.
word.german1912: Du tust mir kund den Weg zum Leben; vor dir ist Freude die Fülle und liebliches Wesen zu deiner Rechten ewiglich.
word.french1910: Tu me feras connaître le sentier de la vie; Il y a d'abondantes joies devant ta face, Des délices éternelles à ta droite.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你必把生命的路指示我，在你面前有滿足的喜樂，在你的右手中有永遠的福樂。
word.tagalog: Iyong ituturo sa akin ang landas ng buhay: nasa iyong harapan ang kapuspusan ng kagalakan; sa iyong kanan ay may mga kasayahan magpakailan man.
word.maori: Ka whakakitea mai e koe ki ahau te huarahi o te ora; kei tou aroaro te hari nui, kei tou matau nga ahuareka e kore e mutu.
word.cebuano: Igapakita mo kanako ang dalan sa kinabuhi: Sa imong presencia anaa ang kahupnganan sa kalipay; Sa imong toong kamot adunay mga kalipayan nga sa walay katapusan.
word.hebrew: יא  תודיעני    ארח חיים שבע שמחות את-פניך    נעמות בימינך נצח
word.hebrewmodern: תודיעני ארח חיים שבע שמחות את פניך נעמות בימינך נצח׃
word.greekot: ἐκβάλλοντές με νυνὶ περιεκύκλωσάν με τοὺς ὀφθαλμοὺς αὐτῶν ἔθεντο ἐκκλῖναι ἐν τῇ γῇ

word.kjv: From men which are thy hand, O LORD, from men of the world, which have their portion in this life, and whose belly thou fillest with thy hid treasure: they are full of children, and leave the rest of their substance to their babes.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ ขอทรงช่วยข้าพระองค์ให้พ้นจากมนุษย์ผู้ซึ่งเป็นพระหัตถ์ของพระองค์ จากมนุษย์แห่งโลกนี้ จากมนุษย์ผู้ซึ่งมีส่วนของชีวิตนี้ ผู้ซึ่งพระองค์ทรงให้ท้องของเขาเต็มไปด้วยทรัพย์สมบัติที่พระองค์ทรงซ่อนไว้ พวกเขามีลูกหลานอุดมสมบูรณ์ และส่วนที่เหลือเขามอบไว้ให้แก่ลูกอ่อนของเขา
word.spanish1909: De los hombres con tu mano, oh Jehová, De los hombres de mundo, cuya parte es en esta vida, Y cuyo vientre hinches de tu tesoro: Hartan sus hijos, Y dejan el resto á sus chiquitos.
word.latinvulgate: Et intonuit de cælo Dominus, et Altissimus dedit vocem suam : grando et carbones ignis.
word.italian1927: liberami, con la tua mano, dagli uomini, o Eterno, dagli uomini del mondo la cui parte è in questa vita, e il cui ventre tu empi co’ tuoi tesori; hanno figliuoli in abbondanza, e lasciano il resto de’ loro averi ai loro fanciulli.
word.german1912: von den Leuten mit deiner Hand, HERR, von den Leuten dieser Welt, welche ihr Teil haben in ihrem Leben, welchen du den Bauch füllst mit deinem Schatz, die da Söhne die Fülle haben und lassen ihr übriges ihren Kindern.
word.french1910: Délivre-moi des hommes par ta main, Eternel, des hommes de ce monde! Leur part est dans la vie, Et tu remplis leur ventre de tes biens; Leurs enfants sont rassasiés, Et ils laissent leur superflu à leurs petits-enfants.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華啊！求你用手救我脫離世人，脫離那些只在今生有分的世人。求你用你為他們儲存的充滿他們的肚腹，使他們的兒女都可以飽嘗，他們還有剩餘的留給他們的子孫。
word.korean: 여호와여, 금생에서 저희 분깃을 받은 세상 사람에게서 나를 주의 손으로 구하소서 그는 주의 재물로 배를 채우심을 입고 자녀로 만족하고 그 남은 산업을 그 어린 아이들에게 유전하는 자니이다
word.tagalog: Sa mga tao, sa pamamagitan ng iyong kamay, Oh Panginoon, sa mga tao ng sanglibutan, na ang bahagi nila ay nasa buhay na ito, at ang tiyan nila'y pinupuno mo ng iyong kayamanan: kanilang binubusog ang kanilang mga anak, at iniiwan nila ang natira sa kanilang pag-aari sa kanilang sanggol.
word.maori: I nga tangata, ma tou ringa, e Ihowa, i nga tangata o te ao: kei tenei ora nei to ratou wahi, a e whakakiia ana o ratou kopu e koe ki tau taonga. E kiki ana ratou i te tamariki, whakarerea iho nga toenga o a ratou taonga ki a ratou kohungahunga.
word.cebuano: Gikan sa mga tawo, pinaagi sa imong kamot, Oh Jehova, Gikan sa mga tawo sa kalibutan, kansang bahin ania niining kinabuhia, Ug kansang tiyan gibusog mo sa imong bahandi: Sila nangabusog sa mga anak, Ug igabilin nila ang salin sa ilang bahandi ngadto sa ilang mga bata.
word.hebrew: יד  ממתים ידך יהוה    ממתים מחלד-- חלקם בחיים    וצפינך (וצפונך) תמלא בטנם ישבעו בנים--    והניחו יתרם לעולליהם
word.hebrewmodern: ממתים ידך יהוה ממתים מחלד חלקם בחיים וצפינך תמלא בטנם ישבעו בנים והניחו יתרם לעולליהם׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἐβρόντησεν ἐξ οὐρανοῦ κύριος καὶ ὁ ὕψιστος ἔδωκεν φωνὴν αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: He asked life of thee, and thou gavest it him, even length of days for ever and ever.
word.thailand: ท่านทูลขอชีวิต และพระองค์ก็ประทานชีวิตยืนนานเป็นนิตย์นิรันดร์
word.spanish1909: Vida te demandó, y dístele Largura de días por siglos y siglos.
word.latinvulgate: Tu autem in sancto habitas, laus Israël.
word.italian1927: Egli t’avea chiesto vita, e tu gliel’hai data: lunghezza di giorni perpetua ed eterna.
word.german1912: Er bittet Leben von dir; so gibst du ihm langes Leben immer und ewiglich.
word.french1910: Il te demandait la vie, tu la lui as donnée, Une vie longue pour toujours et à perpétuité.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他向你求壽，你就賜給他，就是長久的日子，直到永遠。
word.korean: 저가 생명을 구하매 주께서 주셨으니 곧 영영한 장수로소이다
word.tagalog: Siya'y humingi ng buhay sa iyo, iyong binigyan siya; pati ng kahabaan ng mga kaarawan magpakailan pa man.
word.maori: He ora tana i inoi ai i a koe, a kua homai e koe ki a ia, he roa noa atu nga ra ake ake.
word.cebuano: Kinabuhi gipangayo niya kanimo ug gihatagan mo siya, Bisan sa pahalugway sa mga adlaw sa mga katuigan nga walay katapusan.
word.hebrew: ד  כי-תקדמנו ברכות טוב    תשית לראשו עטרת פז
word.hebrewmodern: חיים שאל ממך נתתה לו ארך ימים עולם ועד׃
word.greekot: σὺ δὲ ἐν ἁγίοις κατοικεῖς ὁ ἔπαινος ισραηλ

word.kjv: Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me all the days of my life: and I will dwell in the house of the LORD for ever.
word.thailand: แน่ทีเดียวที่ความดีและความเมตตาจะติดตามข้าพเจ้าไปตลอดวันคืนชีวิตของข้าพเจ้า และข้าพเจ้าจะอยู่ในพระนิเวศของพระเยโฮวาห์สืบไปเป็นนิตย์
word.spanish1909: Ciertamente el bien y la misericordia me seguirán todos los días de mi vida: Y en la casa de Jehová moraré por largos días.
word.latinvulgate: Hæc est generatio quærentium eum, quærentium faciem Dei Jacob.
word.italian1927: Certo, beni e benignità m’accompagneranno tutti i giorni della mia vita; ed io abiterò nella casa dell’Eterno per lunghi giorni.
word.german1912: Gutes und Barmherzigkeit werden mir folgen mein Leben lang, und ich werde bleiben im Hause des HERRN immerdar.
word.french1910: Oui, le bonheur et la grâce m'accompagneront Tous les jours de ma vie, Et j'habiterai dans la maison de l'Eternel Jusqu'à la fin de mes jours.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我一生的日子，必有恩惠慈愛緊隨著我；我也要住在耶和華的殿中，直到永遠。
word.korean: 나의 평생에 선하심과 인자하심이 정녕 나를 따르리니 내가 여호와의 집에 영원히 거하리로다
word.tagalog: Tunay na ang kabutihan at kaawaan ay susunod sa akin sa lahat ng mga kaarawan ng aking buhay: at ako'y tatahan sa bahay ng Panginoon magpakailan man.
word.maori: He pono e aru i ahau te pai me te atawhai i nga ra katoa e ora ai ahau, a ka noho ahau ki te whare o Ihowa ake tonu atu.
word.cebuano: Sa pagkamatuod ang kaayo ug ang mahigugmaong-kalolot magasunod kanako sa adlaw ngatanan sa akong kinabuhi; Ug sa balay ni Jehova magapuyo ako sa walay katapusan.
word.hebrew: ו  אך טוב וחסד ירדפוני--    כל-ימי חיי ושבתי בבית-יהוה    לארך ימים
word.hebrewmodern: אך טוב וחסד ירדפוני כל ימי חיי ושבתי בבית יהוה לארך ימים׃
word.greekot: αὕτη ἡ γενεὰ ζητούντων αὐτόν ζητούντων τὸ πρόσωπον τοῦ θεοῦ ιακωβ διάψαλμα

word.kjv: Gather not my soul with sinners, nor my life with bloody men:
word.thailand: ขออย่าทรงกวาดจิตวิญญาณข้าพระองค์ไปกับคนบาป หรือกวาดชีวิตของข้าพระองค์ไปกับคนกระหายเลือด
word.spanish1909: No juntes con los pecadores mi alma, Ni con los hombres de sangres mi vida:
word.latinvulgate: Ne avertas faciem tuam a me ; ne declines in ira a servo tuo. Adjutor meus esto ; ne derelinquas me, neque despicias me, Deus salutaris meus.
word.italian1927: Non metter l’anima mia in un fascio coi peccatori, né la mia vita con gli uomini di sangue,
word.german1912: Raffe meine Seele nicht hin mit den Sündern noch mein Leben mit den Blutdürstigen,
word.french1910: N'enlève pas mon âme avec les pécheurs, Ma vie avec les hommes de sang,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 求你不要把我的性命和罪人一同除掉，也不要把我的生命和流人血的人一起消滅。
word.korean: 내 영혼을 죄인과 함께 내 생명을 살인자와 함께 거두지 마소서
word.tagalog: Huwag mong isama ang aking kaluluwa sa mga makasalanan, ni ang aking buhay man sa mga mabagsik na tao:
word.maori: Kei huia toku wairua ki roto ki te hunga hara, me toku ora ki roto ki te hunga toto.
word.cebuano: Ayaw itipon ang kalag ko sa mga makasasala, Ni itipon mo ang kinabuhi ko sa mga tawo sa dugo;
word.hebrew: ט  אל-תאסף עם-חטאים נפשי    ועם-אנשי דמים חיי
word.hebrewmodern: אל תאסף עם חטאים נפשי ועם אנשי דמים חיי׃
word.greekot: μὴ ἀποστρέψῃς τὸ πρόσωπόν σου ἀπ' ἐμοῦ μὴ ἐκκλίνῃς ἐν ὀργῇ ἀπὸ τοῦ δούλου σου βοηθός μου γενοῦ μὴ ἀποσκορακίσῃς με καὶ μὴ ἐγκαταλίπῃς με ὁ θεὸς ὁ σωτήρ μου

word.kjv: The LORD is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear? the LORD is the strength of my life; of whom shall I be afraid?
word.thailand: พระเยโฮวาห์ทรงเป็นความสว่างและความรอดของข้าพเจ้า ข้าพเจ้าจะกลัวผู้ใดเล่า พระเยโฮวาห์ทรงเป็นที่กำบังเข้มแข็งแห่งชีวิตข้าพเจ้า ข้าพเจ้าจะต้องเกรงใคร
word.spanish1909: Salmo de David. JEHOVA es mi luz y mi salvación: ¿de quién temeré? Jehová es la fortaleza de mi vida: ¿de quién he de atemorizarme?
word.latinvulgate: Psalmus ipsi David. Ad te, Domine, clamabo ; Deus meus, ne sileas a me : nequando taceas a me, et assimilabor descendentibus in lacum.
word.italian1927: Di Davide. L’Eterno è la mia luce e la mia salvezza; di chi temerò? L’Eterno è il baluardo della mia vita; di chi avrò paura?
word.german1912: Ein Psalm Davids. Der HERR ist mein Licht und mein Heil; vor wem sollte ich mich fürchten! Der HERR ist meines Lebens Kraft; vor wem sollte mir grauen!
word.french1910: De David. L'Eternel est ma lumière et mon salut: De qui aurais-je crainte? L'Eternel est le soutien de ma vie: De qui aurais-je peur?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 大衛的詩。耶和華是我的亮光，是我的救恩，我還怕誰呢？耶和華是我性命的避難所，我還懼誰呢？（本節在《馬索拉抄本》包括細字標題）
word.korean: (다윗의 시) 여호와는 나의 빛이요 나의 구원이시니 내가 누구를 두려워하리요 여호와는 내 생명의 능력이시니 내가 누구를 무서워하리요
word.tagalog: Ang Panginoon ay aking liwanag, at aking kaligtasan: kanino ako matatakot? Ang Panginoon, ay katibayan ng aking buhay; kanino ako masisindak?
word.maori: ¶ Na Rawiri. Ko Ihowa toku marama, toku whakaoranga; kia wehi ahau i a wai? Ko Ihowa te kaha o toku ora; ko wai e mataku ai ahau?
word.cebuano: Si Jehova mao ang akong kahayag ug ang akong kaluwasan; Kinsa man ang akong pagakahadlokan? Si Jehova mao ang kusog sa akong kinabuhi; Kang kinsa man ako malisang?
word.hebrew: א  לדוד    יהוה אורי וישעי--ממי אירא יהוה מעוז-חיי    ממי אפחד
word.hebrewmodern: לדוד יהוה אורי וישעי ממי אירא יהוה מעוז חיי ממי אפחד׃
word.greekot: τοῦ δαυιδ πρὸς σέ κύριε ἐκέκραξα ὁ θεός μου μὴ παρασιωπήσῃς ἀπ' ἐμοῦ μήποτε παρασιωπήσῃς ἀπ' ἐμοῦ καὶ ὁμοιωθήσομαι τοῖς καταβαίνουσιν εἰς λάκκον

word.kjv: One thing have I desired of the LORD, that will I seek after; that I may dwell in the house of the LORD all the days of my life, to behold the beauty of the LORD, and to inquire in his temple.
word.thailand: ข้าพเจ้าทูลขอสิ่งหนึ่งจากพระเยโฮวาห์ซึ่งข้าพเจ้าจะเสาะแสวงหาเสมอ คือที่ข้าพเจ้าจะได้อยู่ในพระนิเวศของพระเยโฮวาห์ตลอดวันเวลาชั่วชีวิตของข้าพเจ้า เพื่อจะดูความงามของพระเยโฮวาห์ และเพื่อจะพินิจพิจารณาอยู่ในพระวิหารของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Una cosa he demandado á Jehová, ésta buscaré: Que esté yo en la casa de Jehová todos los días de mi vida, Para contemplar la hermosura de Jehová, y para inquirir en su templo.
word.latinvulgate: Da illis secundum opera eorum, et secundum nequitiam adinventionum ipsorum. Secundum opera manuum eorum tribue illis, redde retributionem eorum ipsis.
word.italian1927: Una cosa ho chiesto all’Eterno, e quella ricerco: ch’io dimori nella casa dell’Eterno tutti i giorni della mia vita, per mirare la bellezza dell’Eterno e meditare nel suo tempio.
word.german1912: Eins bitte ich vom HERRN, das hätte ich gerne: daß ich im Hause des HERRN bleiben möge mein Leben lang, zu schauen die schönen Gottesdienste des HERRN und seinen Tempel zu betrachten.
word.french1910: Je demande à l'Eternel une chose, que je désire ardemment: Je voudrais habiter toute ma vie dans la maison de l'Eternel, Pour contempler la magnificence de l'Eternel Et pour admirer son temple.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 有一件事我求過耶和華，我還要尋求；我要一生一世住在耶和華的殿裡，瞻仰他的榮美，在他的殿中求問。
word.korean: 내가 여호와께 청하였던 한 가지 일 곧 그것을 구하리니 곧 나로 내 생전에 여호와의 집에 거하여 여호와의 아름다움을 앙망하며 그 전에서 사모하게 하실 것이라
word.tagalog: Isang bagay ang hiningi ko sa Panginoon, na aking hahanapin; na ako'y makatahan sa bahay ng Panginoon, lahat ng mga kaarawan ng aking buhay, upang malasin ang kagandahan ng Panginoon, at magusisa sa kaniyang templo.
word.maori: Kotahi taku mea i inoi ai i a Ihowa, ko taku tena e rapu ai: kia noho i te whare o Ihowa i nga ra katoa e ora ai ahau, kia kite ai i te ataahua o Ihowa, kia ui ai i roto i tona temepara.
word.cebuano: Usa ka butang ang gipangayo ko kang Jehova, nga pagapangitaon Ko: Nga makapuyo ako sa balay ni Jehova sa tanang mga adlaw sa akong kinabuhi, Aron sa pagtan-aw sa katahum ni Jehova. Ug sa pagpakisayud sa iyang templo.
word.hebrew: ד  אחת שאלתי מאת-יהוה--    אותה אבקש שבתי בבית-יהוה    כל-ימי חיי לחזות בנעם-יהוה    ולבקר בהיכלו
word.hebrewmodern: אחת שאלתי מאת יהוה אותה אבקש שבתי בבית יהוה כל ימי חיי לחזות בנעם יהוה ולבקר בהיכלו׃
word.greekot: δὸς αὐτοῖς κατὰ τὰ ἔργα αὐτῶν καὶ κατὰ τὴν πονηρίαν τῶν ἐπιτηδευμάτων αὐτῶν κατὰ τὰ ἔργα τῶν χειρῶν αὐτῶν δὸς αὐτοῖς ἀπόδος τὸ ἀνταπόδομα αὐτῶν αὐτοῖς

word.kjv: For his anger endureth but a moment; in his favour is life: weeping may endure for a night, but joy cometh in the morning.
word.thailand: เพราะพระพิโรธของพระองค์นั้นเป็นแต่ชั่วขณะหนึ่ง และความโปรดปรานของพระองค์นั้นตลอดชีวิต การร้องไห้อาจจะอ้อยอิ่งอยู่สักคืนหนึ่ง แต่ความชื่นบานจะมาเวลาเช้า
word.spanish1909: Porque un momento será su furor; Mas en su voluntad está la vida: Por la tarde durará el lloró, Y á la mañana vendrá la alegría.
word.latinvulgate: Educes me de laqueo hoc quem absconderunt mihi, quoniam tu es protector meus.
word.italian1927: Poiché l’ira sua è sol per un momento, ma la sua benevolenza e per tutta una vita. La sera alberga da noi il pianto; ma la mattina viene il giubilo.
word.german1912: Denn sein Zorn währt einen Augenblick, und lebenslang seine Gnade; den Abend lang währt das Weinen, aber des Morgens ist Freude.
word.french1910: Car sa colère dure un instant, Mais sa grâce toute la vie; Le soir arrivent les pleurs, Et le matin l'allégresse.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為他的怒氣只是短暫的，他的恩惠卻是一生一世的；夜間雖然不斷有哭泣，早晨卻必歡呼。
word.korean: 그 노염은 잠간이요 그 은총은 평생이로다 저녁에는 울음이 기숙할지라도 아침에는 기쁨이 오리로다
word.tagalog: Sapagka't ang kaniyang galit ay sangdali lamang; ang kaniyang paglingap ay habang buhay: pagiyak ay magtatagal ng magdamag, nguni't kagalakan ay dumarating sa kinaumagahan.
word.maori: He iti hoki te wahi e riri ai ia; he oranga ki te manakohia e ia: e tau iho te tangi i te ahiahi, a i te ata he hari.
word.cebuano: Kay ang iyang kasuko umalagi lamang; Ang iyang kalooy alang sa tibook kinabuhi: Ang paghilak mopabilin sa kagabhion, Apan ang kalipay moabut sa kabuntagon.
word.hebrew: ה  זמרו ליהוה חסידיו    והודו לזכר קדשו
word.hebrewmodern: כי רגע באפו חיים ברצונו בערב ילין בכי ולבקר רנה׃
word.greekot: ἐξάξεις με ἐκ παγίδος ταύτης ἧς ἔκρυψάν μοι ὅτι σὺ εἶ ὁ ὑπερασπιστής μου

word.kjv: For my life is spent with grief, and my years with sighing: my strength faileth because of mine iniquity, and my bones are consumed.
word.thailand: เพราะชีวิตของข้าพระองค์ก็ร่อยหรอไปด้วยความทุกข์โศก และปีเดือนของข้าพระองค์ก็หมดไปด้วยการถอนหายใจ กำลังของข้าพระองค์อ่อนลงเพราะความชั่วช้าของข้าพระองค์ และกระดูกของข้าพระองค์ก็ร่วงโรยไป
word.spanish1909: Porque mi vida se va gastando de dolor, y mis años de suspirar: Hase enflaquecido mi fuerza á causa de mi iniquidad, y mis huesos se han consumido.
word.latinvulgate: Multa flagella peccatoris ; sperantem autem in Domino misericordia circumdabit.
word.italian1927: Poiché la mia vita vien meno dal dolore e i miei anni per il sospirare; la forza m’è venuta a mancare per la mia afflizione, e le mie ossa si consumano.
word.german1912: Denn mein Leben hat abgenommen vor Betrübnis und meine Zeit vor Seufzen; meine Kraft ist verfallen vor meiner Missetat, und meine Gebeine sind verschmachtet.
word.french1910: Ma vie se consume dans la douleur, Et mes années dans les soupirs; Ma force est épuisée à cause de mon iniquité, Et mes os dépérissent.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我的生命因愁苦耗盡，我的歲月在歎息中消逝，我的力量因罪孽衰退，我的骨頭也枯乾。
word.korean: 내 생명은 슬픔으로 보내며 나의 해는 탄식으로 보냄이여 내 기력이 나의 죄악으로 약하며 나의 뼈가 쇠하도소이다
word.tagalog: Sapagka't ang aking buhay ay napupugnaw sa kapanglawan, at ang aking mga taon ay sa pagbubuntong hininga: ang aking lakas ay nanglulupaypay dahil sa aking kasamaan, at ang aking mga buto ay nangangatog.
word.maori: Ka hemo nei hoki toku ora i te tangi, me oku tau i te aue; poto iho toku kaha i toku he, kurupopo ana oku iwi.
word.cebuano: Kay ang akong kinabuhi nagaantus sa kasakit, Ug ang akong mga tuig sa pagpanghupaw: Ang akong kusog naluya tungod sa akong kasal-anan, Ug ang akong mga bukog nagakaut-ut.
word.hebrew: י  חנני יהוה    כי צר-לי עששה בכעס עיני    נפשי ובטני
word.hebrewmodern: כי כלו ביגון חיי ושנותי באנחה כשל בעוני כחי ועצמי עששו׃
word.greekot: πολλαὶ αἱ μάστιγες τοῦ ἁμαρτωλοῦ τὸν δὲ ἐλπίζοντα ἐπὶ κύριον ἔλεος κυκλώσει

word.kjv: For I have heard the slander of many: fear was on every side: while they took counsel together against me, they devised to take away my life.
word.thailand: พระเจ้าข้า ข้าพระองค์ได้ยินเสียงซุบซิบของคนเป็นอันมาก มีความสยดสยองอยู่ทุกด้าน ขณะเมื่อเขาร่วมกันคิดแผนการต่อสู้ข้าพระองค์ ขณะที่เขาปองร้ายชีวิตของข้าพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Porque he oído afrenta de muchos; Miedo por todas partes, Cuando consultaban juntos contra mí, E ideaban quitarme la vida.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Perché odo il diffamare di molti, spavento m’è d’ogn’intorno, mentr’essi si consigliano a mio danno, e macchinano di tormi la vita.
word.german1912: Denn ich höre, wie mich viele schelten, Schrecken ist um und um; sie ratschlagen miteinander über mich und denken, mir das Leben zu nehmen.
word.french1910: J'apprends les mauvais propos de plusieurs, L'épouvante qui règne à l'entour, Quand ils se concertent ensemble contre moi: Ils complotent de m'ôter la vie.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我聽見許多人的毀謗，四周都有驚嚇；他們一同商議攻擊我，圖謀要取我的性命。
word.korean: 내가 무리의 비방을 들으오며 사방에 두려움이 있나이다 저희가 나를 치려 의논할 때에 내 생명을 빼앗기로 꾀하였나이다
word.tagalog: Sapagka't aking narinig ang paninirang puri ng marami, kakilabutan sa bawa't dako. Samantalang sila'y nagsasangguniang magkakasama laban sa akin, kanilang pinagsisikapang alisin ang aking buhay.
word.maori: I rongo hoki ahau i te ngautuara a te tini; i karapotia ahau e te wehi: i a ratou e runanga ana ki te he moku, i mea kia whakamatea ahau.
word.cebuano: Kay nadungog ko ang pagtamay sa daghan, Kahadlok sa tagsatagsa nga kiliran: Samtang nanagsabut sila pagtingub batok kanako, Nanaglalang sila sa pagkuha sa akong kinabuhi.
word.hebrew: יג  נשכחתי כמת מלב    הייתי ככלי אבד
word.hebrewmodern: כי שמעתי דבת רבים מגור מסביב בהוסדם יחד עלי לקחת נפשי זממו׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: What man is he that desireth life, and loveth many days, that he may see good?
word.thailand: มนุษย์คนใดผู้ปรารถนาชีวิตและรักวันคืนทั้งหลาย เพื่อเขาจะได้เห็นของดี
word.spanish1909: ¿Quién es el hombre que desea vida, Que codicia días para ver bien?
word.latinvulgate: Retribuebant mihi mala pro bonis, sterilitatem animæ meæ.
word.italian1927: Qual è l’uomo che prenda piacere nella vita, ed ami lunghezza di giorni per goder del bene?
word.german1912: Wer ist, der Leben begehrt und gerne gute Tage hätte?
word.french1910: Quel est l'homme qui aime la vie, Qui désire la prolonger pour jouir du bonheur?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 誰喜愛生命，愛慕長壽，享受美福，
word.korean: 생명을 사모하고 장수하여 복 받기를 원하는 사람이 누구뇨
word.tagalog: Sinong tao ang nagnanasa ng buhay, at umiibig sa maraming kaarawan upang makakita siya ng mabuti?
word.maori: Ko wai te tangata e hiahia ana ki te ora, e whai ana kia maha nga ra, kia kite i te pai?
word.cebuano: Kinsa ba ang tawo nga magatinguha ug kinabuhi, Ug mahagugma sa daghang mga adlaw, aron makita niya ang maayo?
word.hebrew: יב  לכו-בנים שמעו-לי    יראת יהוה אלמדכם
word.hebrewmodern: מי האיש החפץ חיים אהב ימים לראות טוב׃
word.greekot: ἀνταπεδίδοσάν μοι πονηρὰ ἀντὶ καλῶν καὶ ἀτεκνίαν τῇ ψυχῇ μου

word.kjv: For with thee is the fountain of life: in thy light shall we see light.
word.thailand: เพราะธารน้ำพุแห่งชีวิตอยู่กับพระองค์ เราจะเห็นความสว่างโดยสว่างของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Porque contigo está el manantial de la vida: En tu luz veremos la luz.
word.latinvulgate: Quoniam qui malignantur exterminabuntur ; sustinentes autem Dominum, ipsi hæreditabunt terram.
word.italian1927: Poiché in te è la fonte della vita, e per la tua luce noi vediamo la luce.
word.german1912: Denn bei dir ist die Quelle des Lebens, und in deinem Licht sehen wir das Licht.
word.french1910: Car auprès de toi est la source de la vie; Par ta lumière nous voyons la lumière.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為生命的泉源在你那裡；在你的光中，我們才能看見光。
word.korean: 주를 아는 자에게 주의 인자하심을 계속하시며 마음이 정직한 자에게 주의 의를 베푸소서
word.tagalog: Sapagka't nasa iyo ang bukal ng buhay: sa iyong liwanag makakakita kami ng liwanag.
word.maori: Kei a koe hoki te puna o te ora; ma tou marama ka kite ai matou i te marama.
word.cebuano: Kay kanimo anaa ang tuburan sa kinabuhi: Sa imong kahayag makakita kami ug kahayag.
word.hebrew: ט  ירוין מדשן ביתך    ונחל עדניך תשקם
word.hebrewmodern: כי עמך מקור חיים באורך נראה אור׃
word.greekot: ὅτι οἱ πονηρευόμενοι ἐξολεθρευθήσονται οἱ δὲ ὑπομένοντες τὸν κύριον αὐτοὶ κληρονομήσουσιν γῆν

word.kjv: They also that seek after my life lay snares for me: and they that seek my hurt speak mischievous things, and imagine deceits all the day long.
word.thailand: และบรรดาผู้ที่แสวงชีวิตของข้าพระองค์ได้วางบ่วงไว้ บรรดาผู้ที่คิดทำร้ายข้าพระองค์พูดเป็นอุบาย และรำพึงถึงการทรยศอยู่วันยังค่ำ
word.spanish1909: Y los que buscaban mi alma armaron lazos; Y los que procuraban mi mal hablaban iniquidades, Y meditaban fraudes todo el día.
word.latinvulgate: A fortitudine manus tuæ ego defeci in increpationibus, propter iniquitatem corripuisti hominem : et tabescere fecisti sicut araneam animam ejus : verumtamen vane conturbatur omnis homo.
word.italian1927: Quelli che cercan la mia vita mi tendono reti, e quelli che procurano il mio male proferiscon cose maligne e tutto il giorno meditano frodi.
word.german1912: Und die mir nach dem Leben trachten, stellen mir nach; und die mir übelwollen, reden, wie sie Schaden tun wollen, und gehen mit eitel Listen um.
word.french1910: Ceux qui en veulent à ma vie tendent leurs pièges; Ceux qui cherchent mon malheur disent des méchancetés, Et méditent tout le jour des tromperies.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 那些尋索我命的，設下網羅；那些想要害我的，口說威嚇的話，他們整天思想詭計。
word.korean: 내 생명을 찾는 자가 올무를 놓고 나를 해하려는 자가 괴악한 일을 말하여 종일토록 궤계를 도모하오나
word.tagalog: Sila namang nangaguusig ng aking buhay ay nangaglagay ng mga silo na ukol sa akin; at silang nagsisihanap ng aking ikapapahamak ay nangagsasalita ng mga masasamang bagay, at nangagiisip ng pagdaraya buong araw.
word.maori: ¶ E whakatakoto mahanga ana moku te hunga e whai ana i ahau kia whakamatea; he nanakia ano nga kupu a te hunga e rapu ana i te he moku; he whakaaro tinihanga ano a ratou a pau noa te ra.
word.cebuano: Sila usab nga mga nanagpangita sa akong kinabuhi nanagbutang ug mga lit-ag alang kanako ; Ug sila nga nanagtinguha sa akong pagkalaglag nanagsulti ug mga buhat nga kadautan, Ug nanagpamalandong ug mga limbong sa tibook nga adlaw.
word.hebrew: יב  אהבי ורעי--מנגד נגעי יעמדו    וקרובי מרחק עמדו
word.hebrewmodern: וינקשו מבקשי נפשי ודרשי רעתי דברו הוות ומרמות כל היום יהגו׃
word.greekot: ἐν ἐλεγμοῖς ὑπὲρ ἀνομίας ἐπαίδευσας ἄνθρωπον καὶ ἐξέτηξας ὡς ἀράχνην τὴν ψυχὴν αὐτοῦ πλὴν μάτην ταράσσεται πᾶς ἄνθρωπος διάψαλμα

word.kjv: Yet the LORD will command his lovingkindness in the daytime, and in the night his song shall be with me, and my prayer unto the God of my life.
word.thailand: กลางวันพระเยโฮวาห์จะทรงบัญชาความเมตตาของพระองค์ และกลางคืนเพลงของพระองค์จะอยู่กับข้าพเจ้า พร้อมกับคำอธิษฐานต่อพระเจ้าแห่งชีวิตของข้าพเจ้า
word.spanish1909: De día mandará Jehová su misericordia, Y de noche su canción será conmigo, Y oración al Dios de mi vida.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: L’Eterno, di giorno, mandava la sua benignità, e la notte eran meco i suoi cantici, la preghiera all’Iddio della mia vita.
word.german1912: Der HERR hat des Tages verheißen seine Güte, und des Nachts singe ich ihm und bete zu dem Gott meines Lebens.
word.french1910: Le jour, l'Eternel m'accordait sa grâce; La nuit, je chantais ses louanges, J'adressais une prière au Dieu de ma vie.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 白天耶和華賜下他的慈愛；夜間我要向他歌頌，向賜我生命的　神禱告。
word.korean: 낮에는 여호와께서 그 인자함을 베푸시고 밤에는 그 찬송이 내게 있어 생명의 하나님께 기도하리로다
word.tagalog: Gayon ma'y uutusan ng Panginoon ang kaniyang kagandahang-loob sa araw, at sa gabi ay sasa akin ang awit sa kaniya, sa makatuwid baga'y isang dalangin sa Dios ng aking buhay.
word.maori: Ahakoa ra e whakahaua mai ano e Ihowa tona atawhai i te awatea; a he waiata taku ki a ia i te po, he inoi ki te Atua o toku ora.
word.cebuano: Bisan pa niini , si Jehova magasugo sa iyang mahigugmaong-kalolot sulod sa adlaw; Ug sa kagabhion ang iyang alawiton magauban kanako, Bisan ang usa ka pag-ampo ngadto sa Dios sa akong kinabuhi.
word.hebrew: ח  תהום-אל-תהום קורא    לקול צנוריך כל-משבריך וגליך    עלי עברו
word.hebrewmodern: יומם יצוה יהוה חסדו ובלילה שירה עמי תפלה לאל חיי׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Thou wilt prolong the king's life: and his years as many generations.
word.thailand: พระองค์จะทรงยืดพระชนม์ของกษัตริย์ ให้ปีเดือนของท่านยืนนานไปหลายชั่วอายุ
word.spanish1909: Días sobre días añadirás al rey: Sus años serán como generación y generación.
word.latinvulgate: Verumtamen Deo subjecta esto, anima mea, quoniam ab ipso patientia mea ;
word.italian1927: Aggiungi dei giorni ai giorni del re, siano i suoi anni come molte età!
word.german1912: Du wollest dem König langes Leben geben, daß seine Jahre währen immer für und für,
word.french1910: Ajoute des jours aux jours du roi; Que ses années se prolongent à jamais!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 願你增添王的壽數；願他的年日世世無窮。
word.korean: 주께서 왕으로 장수케 하사 그 나이 여러 대에 미치게 하시리이다
word.tagalog: Iyong pahahabain ang buhay ng hari: Ang kaniyang mga taon ay magiging parang malaong panahon.
word.maori: Ka whakaraneatia e koe nga ra o te kingi; ona tau ki nga whakatupuranga katoa.
word.cebuano: Pagalugwayan mo ang kinabuhi sa hari; Ang iyang mga tuig maingon sa kadaghan sa mga kaliwatan.
word.hebrew: ו  כי-אתה אלהים שמעת לנדרי    נתת ירשת יראי שמך
word.hebrewmodern: ימים על ימי מלך תוסיף שנותיו כמו דר ודר׃
word.greekot: πλὴν τῷ θεῷ ὑποτάγηθι ἡ ψυχή μου ὅτι παρ' αὐτοῦ ἡ ὑπομονή μου

word.kjv: Because thy lovingkindness is better than life, my lips shall praise thee.
word.thailand: เพราะว่าความเมตตาของพระองค์ดีกว่าชีวิต ริมฝีปากของข้าพระองค์จะสรรเสริญพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Porque mejor es tu misericordia que la vida: Mis labios te alabarán.
word.latinvulgate: Protexisti me a conventu malignantium, a multitudine operantium iniquitatem.
word.italian1927: Poiché la tua benignità val meglio della vita; le mie labbra ti loderanno.
word.german1912: Denn deine Güte ist besser denn Leben; meine Lippen preisen dich.
word.french1910: Car ta bonté vaut mieux que la vie: Mes lèvres célèbrent tes louanges.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因你的慈愛比生命更好，我的嘴唇要頌讚你。
word.korean: 주의 인자가 생명보다 나으므로 내 입술이 주를 찬양할 것이라
word.tagalog: Sapagka't ang iyong kagandahang-loob ay mainam kay sa buhay: pupurihin ka ng aking mga labi.
word.maori: ¶ Pai atu tou aroha i te ora: mo reira ka whakamoemiti oku ngutu ki a koe.
word.cebuano: Tungod kay ang imong mahigugmaong-kalolot labi pang maayo kay sa kinabuhi, Ang akong mga ngabil magadayeg kanimo.
word.hebrew: ג  כן בקדש חזיתך--    לראות עזך וכבודך
word.hebrewmodern: כי טוב חסדך מחיים שפתי ישבחונך׃
word.greekot: ἐσκέπασάς με ἀπὸ συστροφῆς πονηρευομένων ἀπὸ πλήθους ἐργαζομένων τὴν ἀνομίαν

word.kjv: Hear my voice, O God, in my prayer: preserve my life from fear of the enemy.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเจ้า ขอทรงสดับเสียงของข้าพระองค์เมื่อข้าพระองค์อธิษฐาน ขอทรงสงวนชีวิตของข้าพระองค์ไว้จากความคิดกลัวศัตรู
word.spanish1909: Al Músico principal: Salmo de David. ESCUCHA, oh Dios, mi voz en mi oración: Guarda mi vida del miedo del enemigo.
word.latinvulgate: In finem. Psalmus David, canticum Jeremiæ, et Ezechielis, populo transmigrationis, cum inciperent exire.
word.italian1927: Per il Capo de’ musici. Salmo di Davide. O Dio, ascolta la mia voce nel mio lamento! Guarda la mia vita dallo spavento del nemico.
word.german1912: Ein Psalm Davids, vorzusingen.  Höre, Gott, meine Stimme in meiner Klage; behüte mein Leben vor dem grausamen Feinde.
word.french1910: Au chef des chantres. Psaume de David. O Dieu, écoute ma voix, quand je gémis! Protège ma vie contre l'ennemi que je crains!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 大衛的詩，交給詩班長。　神啊！我哀訴的時候，求你垂聽我的聲音；求你保護我的性命，脫離仇敵的恐嚇。
word.korean: (다윗의 시. 영장으로 한 노래) 하나님이여, 나의 근심하는 소리를 들으시고 원수의 두려움에서 나의 생명을 보존하소서
word.tagalog: Dinggin mo ang tinig ko, Oh Dios, sa aking hibik: ingatan mo ang buhay ko sa pagkatakot sa kaaway.
word.maori: ¶ Ki te tino kaiwhakatangi. He himene na Rawiri. Whakarongo ki toku reo, e te Atua, ina inoi atu ahau: tiakina toku ora i te wehi o te hoariri.
word.cebuano: Patalinghugi ang akong tingog, Oh Dios, sa akong pangamuyo: Bantayi ang akong kinabuhi gikan sa kahadlok sa kaaway.
word.hebrew: א  למנצח מזמור לדוד
word.hebrewmodern: למנצח מזמור לדוד שמע אלהים קולי בשיחי מפחד אויב תצר חיי׃
word.greekot: εἰς τὸ τέλος ψαλμὸς τῷ δαυιδ ᾠδή ιερεμιου καὶ ιεζεκιηλ ἐκ τοῦ λόγου τῆς παροικίας ὅτε ἔμελλον ἐκπορεύεσθαι

word.kjv: Which holdeth our soul in life, and suffereth not our feet to be moved.
word.thailand: ผู้ทรงให้จิตวิญญาณเราอยู่ท่ามกลางคนเป็น และมิได้ทรงยอมให้เท้าเราพลาด
word.spanish1909: El es el que puso nuestra alma en vida, Y no permitió que nuestros pies resbalasen.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Egli ha conservato in vita l’anima nostra, non ha permesso che il nostro piè vacillasse.
word.german1912: der unsre Seelen im Leben erhält und läßt unsre Füße nicht gleiten.
word.french1910: Il a conservé la vie à notre âme, Et il n'a pas permis que notre pied chancelât.

word.kjv: He made a way to his anger; he spared not their soul from death, but gave their life over to the pestilence;
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงเปิดวิถีให้แก่ความกริ้วของพระองค์ พระองค์มิได้ทรงเว้นจิตวิญญาณเขาไว้จากความตาย แต่ประทานชีวิตของเขาแก่โรคระบาด
word.spanish1909: Dispuso el camino á su furor; No eximió la vida de ellos de la muerte, Sino que entregó su vida á la mortandad.

word.italian1927: Dette libero corso alla sua ira; non preservò dalla morte la loro anima, ma abbandonò la loro vita alla pestilenza.

word.korean: 그 노를 위하여 치도하사 저희 혼의 사망을 면케 아니하시고 저희 생명을 염병에 붙이셨으며
word.tagalog: Kaniyang iginawa ng landas ang kaniyang galit; hindi niya pinigil ang kanilang buhay sa kamatayan, kundi ibinigay ang kanilang buhay sa pagkapuksa;
word.maori: A whakatikaia ana e ia he ara mo tona riri; kihai i tohungia to ratou wairua kei mate: otiia tukua ana e ia to ratou ora ki te mate uruta.
word.cebuano: Nagbuhat siya ug usa ka dalan alang sa iyang kasuko; Wala niya sayloi ang ilang mga kalag gikan sa kamatayon, Kondili nga iyang gitugyan ang ilang mga kinabuhi sa kamatay,

word.kjv: For my soul is full of troubles: and my life draweth nigh unto the grave.
word.thailand: เพราะจิตใจของข้าพระองค์ลำบากเต็มที และชีวิตของข้าพระองค์เข้าใกล้แดนผู้ตาย

word.german1912: Denn meine Seele ist voll Jammers, und mein Leben ist nahe dem Tode.
word.french1910: Car mon âme est rassasiée de maux, Et ma vie s'approche du séjour des morts.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為我飽經憂患，我的性命臨近陰間。
word.korean: 대저 나의 영혼에 곤란이 가득하며 나의 생명은 음부에 가까왔사오니
word.tagalog: Sapagka't ang aking kaluluwa ay lipos ng mga kabagabagan, at ang aking buhay ay nalalapit sa Sheol,
word.maori: Kua ki hoki toku wairua i te pouri, a e whakatata ana toku ora ki te reinga.
word.cebuano: Kay ang akong kalag napuno sa mga kagul-anan, Ug ang akong kinabuhi nagapahaduol na ngadto sa Sheol.

word.kjv: With long life will I satisfy him, and shew him my salvation.

word.spanish1909: Saciarélo de larga vida, Y mostraréle mi salud.
word.latinvulgate: ut annuntient quoniam rectus Dominus Deus noster, et non est iniquitas in eo.
word.italian1927: Lo sazierò di lunga vita, e gli farò vedere la mia salvezza.
word.german1912: Ich will ihn sättigen mit langem Leben und will ihm zeigen mein Heil."

word.chinesencvtraditional: 我必使他得享長壽，又向他顯明我的救恩。”

word.kjv: Who redeemeth thy life from destruction; who crowneth thee with lovingkindness and tender mercies;

word.hebrew: ג  כטל-חרמון--    שירד על-הררי ציון כי שם צוה יהוה    את-הברכה-- חיים    עד-העולם

word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為它們必把長久的日子、生命的歲數和平安，加給你。
word.korean: 그리하면 그것이 너로 장수하여 많은 해를 누리게 하며 평강을 더하게 하리라
word.tagalog: Sapagka't karamihan ng mga araw, at mga taon ng buhay, at kapayapaan, ay madadagdag sa iyo.
word.maori: Katahi ka nui ake nga ra roa mou, nga tau e ora ai, me te ata noho.
word.cebuano: Kay ang kadugayon sa mga adlaw, ug mga tuig sa kinabuhi, Ug pakigdait, sila igadugang kanimo.
word.hebrew: ב  כי ארך ימים ושנות חיים--    ושלום יוסיפו לך
word.hebrewmodern: כי ארך ימים ושנות חיים ושלום יוסיפו לך׃
word.greekot: μῆκος γὰρ βίου καὶ ἔτη ζωῆς καὶ εἰρήνην προσθήσουσίν σοι

word.kjv: The is a tree of life to them that lay hold upon her: and happy is every one that retaineth her.
word.thailand: เธอเป็นต้นไม้แห่งชีวิตแก่ผู้ที่ยึดเธอไว้ บรรดาผู้ที่ยึดเธอไว้แน่นก็เป็นสุข
word.spanish1909: Ella es árbol de vida á los que de ella asen: Y bienaventurados son los que la mantienen.
word.latinvulgate: Lignum vitæ est his qui apprehenderint eam, et qui tenuerit eam beatus.
word.italian1927: Essa è un albero di vita per quei che l’afferrano, e quei che la ritengon fermamente sono beati.
word.german1912: Sie ist ein Baum des Lebens allen, die sie ergreifen; und selig sind, die sie halten.
word.french1910: Elle est un arbre de vie pour ceux qui la saisissent, Et ceux qui la possèdent sont heureux.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 對緊握智慧的人來說，智慧是生命樹，凡是緊抓智慧的，都是有福的。
word.korean: 지혜는 그 얻은 자에게 생명나무라 지혜를 가진 자는 복되도다
word.tagalog: Siya ay punong kahoy ng buhay sa mga nanghahawak sa kaniya: at mapalad ang bawa't isa na nangamamalagi sa kaniya.
word.maori: He rakau ia no te ora ki te hunga e u ana ki a ia; ka hari te tangata e pupuri ana i a ia.
word.cebuano: Siya maoy usa ka kahoy sa kinabuhi kanila nga mokupot kaniya: Ug malipayon ang tagsatagsa nga magahawid kaniya.
word.hebrew: יח  עץ-חיים היא למחזיקים בה    ותמכיה מאשר
word.hebrewmodern: עץ חיים היא למחזיקים בה ותמכיה מאשר׃
word.greekot: ξύλον ζωῆς ἐστι πᾶσι τοῖς ἀντεχομένοις αὐτῆς καὶ τοῖς ἐπερειδομένοις ἐπ' αὐτὴν ὡς ἐπὶ κύριον ἀσφαλής

word.kjv: So shall they be life unto thy soul, and grace to thy neck.
word.thailand: ดังนั้นทั้งสองจะเป็นชีวิตแก่จิตใจของเจ้า จะเป็นความงดงามประดับคอของเจ้า
word.spanish1909: Y serán vida á tu alma, Y gracia á tu cuello.
word.latinvulgate: et erit vita animæ tuæ, et gratia faucibus tuis.
word.italian1927: Esse saranno la vita dell’anima tua e un ornamento al tuo collo.
